smeg-manual-espresso-coffee-machine-ecf02-white,Smeg Manual Espresso Coffee Machine #ECF02BLUS - Black,"

Treat yourself to the luxury of savouring a coffee that tastes as good as at the one served at the café in the comfort of your own home, and furnish your kitchen with an eye-catching design object. ECF02 is the Made in Italy manual espresso coffee machine that with its 15-bar pressure, guarantees the best result when it comes to excellent espresso coffee. It is easy-to-use and, thanks to its steam wand, enables you to obtain a luscious, creamy, milk froth. Combined with the style and gestures of a real Italian barista.
Thermoblock. Thermoblock heating system that ensures a faster preparation time for the machine and precise temperature control of the water for coffee extraction.
Compact Machine. Compact and space saving.
Drip Tray. Removable drip tray for large cup holders and easy cleaning.
15 bar pump. 15 bar pump power for consistently correct extraction of your espresso.

Made in Italy. Renewed design and made in Italy production are the elements that characterize the new espresso coffee machine. The combination of aesthetics and reliability allows you to enjoy the intense aroma of a real Italian espresso or a creamy and enveloping milk froth.

Perfect espresso in a few seconds. The new ECF02 coffee machine is suitable for both ground coffee and paper pods, thanks to its stainless-steel filter holder. In addition, the Thermoblock heating system ensures fast brewing times and precise control of the water temperature for coffee brewing. With a pressure of 15 Bar, the new Smeg ECF02 coffee machine promises the best results for an excellent Espresso.
51mm portafilter. Stainless steel 51mm filter holder, suitable for coffee powder filters or paper pods.
Espresso specific. Espresso coffee machine designed to perfectly dispense authentic Italian espresso, with quick controls for single, double espresso or long drinks.
Milk function. Thanks to the steam wand, it is always possible to get a perfect milk foam, perfect for creating different barista style drinks.

Convenient usability. The ECF02 Espresso coffee machine has a control panel with a double menu that allows you to select 4 espresso functions according to your preferences. With the steam wand you can easily create a rich and creamy milk foam, perfect for preparations such as cappuccino, flat white and latte macchiato.
Espresso Maker, Tamper, double wall 1 cup filter, double wall 2 cup filter, paper pods filter, water hardness test strip, steam wand cleaning needle
Espresso Coffee, Ristretto Coffee, Coffee, Light Ristretto Coffee, Light Espresso Coffee, Long Coffee, Americano Coffee
Adjustable coffee temperature: low, medium, high

For detailed care instructions, please refer to your machine's user manual. To download your machine's user manual click here. We recommend that you also incorporate the following into your cleaning routine:
• Descale when the machine prompts you, approximately every 3-6 months. We recommend using  DeLonghi EcoDecalk.
• Soap out water tank (if applicable) and drip tray every few days.
• Keep the stainless steel casing shiny with a microfiber cloth.
• Remove coffee oil build up in your portafilter and baskets by soaking them in hot water and one backflushing tablet once a week. We recommend using Cafiza tablets for this.
• Replace your DeLonghi DLS C002 every 2-3 months.
1 year limited product warranty from Smeg Canada via Royco Limited. For warranty questions &
column2:
claims, contact Royco Limited at warrantyservices@roycolimited.com or 1-877-528-4846.  For faster service when you call, please have the following readily available: Provide the product model number listed above, and have an original or a copy of the sales receipt.

Espresso Maker, Tamper, double wall 1 cup filter, double wall 2 cup filter, paper pods filter, water hardness test strip, steam wand cleaning needle
Espresso Coffee, Ristretto Coffee, Coffee, Light Ristretto Coffee, Light Espresso Coffee, Long Coffee, Americano Coffee
Adjustable coffee temperature: low, medium, high

For detailed care instructions, please refer to your machine's user manual. To download your machine's user manual click here. We recommend that you also incorporate the following into your cleaning routine:
• Descale when the machine prompts you, approximately every 3-6 months. We recommend using  DeLonghi EcoDecalk.
• Soap out water tank (if applicable) and drip tray every few days.
• Keep the stainless steel casing shiny with a microfiber cloth.
• Remove coffee oil build up in your portafilter and baskets by soaking them in hot water and one backflushing tablet once a week. We recommend using Cafiza tablets for this.
• Replace your DeLonghi DLS C002 every 2-3 months.

column1: Live your barista dreams and enjoy moments of pure Italian style every day. The EGF03 coffee machine enables you to customize every step of your coffee brewing, in a professional, connoisseur-like way: choose the blend you prefer, insert the coffee beans into the integrated grinder, select the pre-infusion that best suits your taste (short, standard, long or progressive) and the coffee extraction temperature.
Then proceed to brew: the pressure gauge will show whether you have carried out the correct coffee grinding and pressing operations to achieve perfect espresso coffee extraction.
You can also prepare milk-based drinks using the professional steam wand!
Grinding Function. Built-in coffee grinder, the true coffee flavor from freshly ground coffee beans.
Dual Thermoblock. Double thermobock heating system: brewing coffee and steam ready without waiting times.
Espresso Specific. Espresso coffee machine designed for perfect delivery of true Italian espresso, with functions for single and double espresso.
20 bar pump. 20 bar pump pressure: for a correct extraction of the espresso.
58 mm diameter portafilter. Professional 58 mm filter holder, designed to always have the best result in the cup.
Customizable. Possibility to choose between 4 extraction temperature levels and 4 pre-infusion profiles
Manometro. Thanks to the pressure gauge, it is possible to check whether the coffee is being extracted at the correct extraction pressure.
Milk Function. Stainless steel steam wand for perfect milk foam in the cup and an authentic barista experience.

Accessories. Set of accessories to complete the 'Barista' experience: filters for single and double coffee, single and double wall, stainless steel carafe, stainless steel tamper, water hardness strip, cleaning disc, brushes and cleaning needle.

joe-frex-digital-brewing-scale-w-battery-xwm,JoeFrex Digital Brewing Scale 5kg & Timer #xwm,"

No more guessing at coffee scoops and water usage. This scale helps you know exactly how much coffee and water you're using, so you can modify your brew to precision and get the best flavour out of your coffee.

• Timer function: Timer starts by pressing TIME key, until stopped by same key, or alternatively through the integrated automatic stop function by lifting the object (e.g. cup/glass) vertically off the weighing platform. In both cases the display shows stopped time value until reset to zero by pressing the TIME key again.
13 x 20 x 3 cm  Platform: 13 x 13 cm

This digital coffee scale is a great tool for baristas, allowing you to measure your coffee grounds and water so you can get the perfect taste out of your daily brew. With high accuracy, a compact size and illuminated display, this compact tool is a great addition to any home coffee bar.
• Battery operated - comes with 2 x AAA batteries
• Functions: Tare / Zero, On, M (change weighing unit), calibration
• Dimensions: 8 cm x 11 cm x 2 cm / (3,15 x 4,3 x 0,8 inch)

column5: mce-data-marked=""1"">It's tall, insulated, and with its sizeable handle, it's the beer lover's new drinking buddy. Unlike beer glasses, this mighty mug is safe for camp. Plus, this stainless steel beer mug is topped with the fan favourite MagSlider™ Lid, and the entire mug is dishwasher safe, making clean-up jobs extra easy at base camp. Bottoms up, y'all.

column3: mce-data-marked=""1"">Please note: do not place mug over external heat source or open flame. Vacuum seal or other damage may occur. This magnet slider is not leakproof and will not prevent spills.

yeti-rambler-42-oz-mug-with-straw-lid-white,"YETI Rambler 42 oz. Mug With Straw Lid, White","

Take hydration head-on with YETI's biggest straw mug ever. From water around the clock to post-workout protein shakes, it's your cupholder co-pilot for sips that don't stop on days that don't either. And with the fan-favourite Straw Lid, you can kiss single-use straws goodbye.

Like all Rambler Drinkware, the mug and lid are dishwasher safe. Rambler straw lids are built to last and have a molded-in stopper that holds your straw safely in place. And just like other rambler straw lids, it's shatter resistant, dishwasher-safe and completely BPA-free.
Please note that this Lid is not for use with hot beverages.
18/8 Stainless Steel. Made with kitchen-grade stainless steel, so it's puncture and rust-resistant.
Double Wall Vacuum Insulation. Keeps drinks cold (or hot) to the last drop.
Dishwasher Safe. Because no one needs more work to do.
Cup Holder Compatible. Safely makes it from point A to B.
No Sweat Design. Sized to be by your side through every road trip and morning commute.
Duracoat Colour. If your rambler drinkware comes in DuraCoat Colour, rest assured it won't peel or crack.

yeti-rambler-42-oz-mug-with-straw-lid-seafoam,"YETI Rambler 42 oz. Mug With Straw Lid, Seafoam","

Take hydration head-on with YETI's biggest straw mug ever. From water around the clock to post-workout protein shakes, it's your cupholder co-pilot for sips that don't stop on days that don't either. And with the fan-favourite Straw Lid, you can kiss single-use straws goodbye.

Like all Rambler Drinkware, the mug and lid are dishwasher safe. Rambler straw lids are built to last and have a molded-in stopper that holds your straw safely in place. And just like other rambler straw lids, it's shatter resistant, dishwasher-safe and completely BPA-free.
Please note that this Lid is not for use with hot beverages.
18/8 Stainless Steel. Made with kitchen-grade stainless steel, so it's puncture and rust-resistant.
Double Wall Vacuum Insulation. Keeps drinks cold (or hot) to the last drop.
Dishwasher Safe. Because no one needs more work to do.
Cup Holder Compatible. Safely makes it from point A to B.
No Sweat Design. Sized to be by your side through every road trip and morning commute.
Duracoat Colour. If your rambler drinkware comes in DuraCoat Colour, rest assured it won't peel or crack.

yeti-rambler-wine-chiller-white,"YETI Rambler Wine Chiller, White","<meta charset=""utf-8"">

Designed for wine nights in the wild, this cold-holding wine chiller is durable enough to withstand any condition, and sized to fit nearly any wine or champagne bottle. Just drop in a cold bottle to lock in the perfect sipping temp for hours. Pre0chill your wine chiller in an icy cooler or your fridge for best results.
Fits most wine and champagne bottles. Reds, whites, and rosés are all at home here.
Silicone landing pad. Keeps your wine bottle safe without a sound.
Bearfoot non-slip ring. Stands securely without slipping to keep your wine in its place.
No Sweat Design. Prevents condensation to keep your tabletop dry - and your wine chilled.
• Fits most champagne, bomber or wine bottles

profitec-go-black,"Profitec GO Espresso Machine, Black","

The GO is a compact single boiler machine with a ring brew group.
1,2, 3...GO: After a very short heating phase, the machine is ready to make your espresso.

column2: GO: The espresso extraction, the steam mode activation and switching the machine on and off, simply at the touch of a button.

column1: Never lose Control: The display shows the coffee brewing time to the second. The PID temperature control also allows you to set the desired temperature for coffee extraction and steam. The brewing pressure can be adjusted on the easily accessible expansion valve. In addition, a reminder can be set to display when to clean it if you wish. The ECO mode also allows you to program a timer to switch off the boiler when not in use to save energy.

PID Temperature Control. You can get extremely precise brew temperatures using the PID temperature control on the GO. This helps immensely with repeatability and makes it easy to adjust the temperature, toggle ECO mode, and toggle the Cln cleaning reminder. The PID screen and controls are located just above the drip tray, making viewing your settings very easy as well.

Eco Brass Boiler. The .4-liter eco brass boiler works in conjunction with the 800 watt heating element to quickly heat up this espresso machine, allowing you to brew in just 5-7 minutes. When you switch to steam power, the GO is ready to brew in about a minute, so you can keep things moving smoothly during the brewing process.

Sleek, Compact Design. The Profitec GO is an extremely compact machine at just 14.9 inches tall, 8.25 inches wide, and 14.5 inches deep, so you can easily fit it into most kitchens. The simple controls allow for a sleek, streamlined appearance without taking away from the functionality of this espresso machine.

Intuitive Controls. The easy-to-use controls located on the front of the GO allow you to easily brew, steam, and adjust the temperature settings on your espresso machine. At just the touch of a button or the turn of a knob, you’re quickly on your way to brewing espresso or steaming your milk.

Pressure Gauge. With the pressure gauge located on the front of the Profitec GO just above the drip tray, you can view what pressure the ring brew group is brewing your espresso at. If you want to adjust the pressure, Profitec has made it easy by making the OPV easily accessible inside the machine just under the cup tray.
1 portafilter 2 spouts (58mm), 1 filter 1 cup, 1 filter 2 cups, 1 blind filter, 1 coffee tamper, 1 cleaning brush, 1 user manual

column2: Single Espresso, Hot Milk, Hot Water

column1: 110 V / 50-60 Hz / 900 W heating element
For full details on getting started and maintaining your machine, we recommend reading the user manual.
Click here to download the user manual.
Portafilter, filters, water tank and drip tray require daily cleaning. Clean with water and / or with a food safe detergent.
We recommend descaling your machine every 3 months depending on water hardness.
We recommend carrying out the brew group cleaning or backflushing every 150 cups.

Warranty
",Profitec,,Equipment,"Black, Coming Soon, Espresso Machines, Italy, Manual Milk / Steam Wand, No Grinder, Profitec, Semi-Automatic Espresso Machines, Single Boiler, USA Ready",true,Title,Default Title,,,,,EPROFITECGOBLK,12900.0,,0,deny,manual,1286.73,1379.00,true,true,,https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0597/6866/8238/files/profitec-go-black-1.jpg?v=1712089375,1,"",false,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,kg,,,true,,,true,,,true,,,active

yeti-camino-20-carryall-agave-teal,"YETI Camino 20 Carryall, Agave Teal","<meta charset=""utf-8"">

Tough inside and out, the new and improved Camino® 20 Carryall now features deployable dividers and two interior zippered pockets. Made from the same waterproof, ultra-durable, and easy-to-clean material as the Panga® Duffel, this tote bag will keep your wet boots and waders contained, protect dry gear from mud and puddles, and provide a tough barrier against climbing gear. Designed to make any adventure’s dirty work a little easier, the Camino® 20 Carryall is the perfect all-purpose, here-to-there bag for any and every day.
Please note: This product is not a cooler.
Built for a day out or a weekend off.
Perfect for picnic supplies or camping essentials.
Deployable dividers fit up all Rambler Bottle sizes and Half Gallon Jug.

Durable construction. This standup companion has a waterproof, puncture-resistant ThickSkin™ Shell that keeps moisture and frays at bay. And with its sturdy EVA Molded Bottom, the bag stays upright, and water stays out.

Multiple Ways to Carry. The Camino® 20 Carryall is a haul-it-anywhere, up-for-anything tote. Throw it over your shoulder or pick it up by the CrossBar™ Handles. Whichever way you choose this bag pulls its weight, so you can carry on with your day.

Deployable Dividers. The Camino® 20 Carryall features deployable dividers so you can keep your gear organized and at the ready. Simply tuck away the dividers when not in use to create one large compartment.
• Made of high density nylon and thick TPU lamination.
• External Dimensions: 15"" W x 7.8"" D x 13.5"" H

yeti-rambler-beverage-bucket-king-crab,"YETI Rambler Beverage Bucket, King Crab","<meta charset=""utf-8"">

There is no better vessel to help recall and rejoice in wild adventures than an ice cold bucket of cheer. Keep drinks and refills within arm's reach when hosting small gatherings. Holds 6+ cans and 3+ wine bottles as a beverage bucket and converts to an ice bucket with included press fit lid.
Please note: this product is not a cooler. Accessories sold separately.
Bearfoot Non-slip ring. No slipping, no sliding, and it's non-marking.
Surestrong Build. This workhouse is high-impact-resistant and virtually indestructible.
Lipgrip Handle. Makes carrying your catch seem like less of a chore.

yeti-rambler-half-gallon-jug-agave-teal,"YETI Rambler Half Gallon Jug, Agave Teal","<meta charset=""utf-8"">

column3: >With rugged construction, FatLid insulation and a stainless steel handle, the Rambler Half Gallon Jug is built to take on the wild. Whenever and wherever you need it, count on an ice cold (or piping hot) sip from your rambler to come to the rescue. LIke the entire Rambler Family, this reusable jug and its lid are easy to clean and dishwasher safe.

column1: 18/8 Stainless Steel. Made with kitchen-grade stainless steel, so they're puncture and rust resistant.
Double-Wall Vacuum Insulation. Keeps cold drinks cold and hot drinks hot until the last sip.
Dishwasher Safe. Because no one needs more work to do.
Stainless Steel Handle. Stainless steel handle with rubber grip makes for sturdy, easy transport.

column3: >The Rambler 10 oz. Lowball is the ideal drinking companion. column3: >At a glance, this mug might look like your everyday drinking vessel, but look again. It's loaded with top to bottom insulation to keep your coffee hot from the first pour to the last sip. And it's a space saver. When the lid is removed, the built in grooves on the bottom help it stack perfectly on top of another one just like it. So whether you're storing it in the cabinets or packing it up for an adventure - it one ups the average mug. Like the entire Rambler Family, this stackable mug and included MagSlider Lid are dishwasher safe making them easy to clean, but please note - the smooth sliding magnet component is not leakproof and will not prevent spills.

column1: Dishwasher safe. Because no one needs more work to do.

Double wall vacuum insulation. Keeps drinks hot (or cold) to the last drop.
No sweat design. Prevents condensation keeping hands dry.
Duracoat Colour. Built for the wild, this colour won't peel or crack.
• Important: Do not place mug over external heat source or open flame. Vacuum seal or other damage may occur.

column3: >Savour those day saving espresso shots with a tumbler primed for the job - the Rambler 10 oz. Tumbler. Its condensed stature holds just enough for just about anywhere. We also went ahead and topped this guy off with our fan favourite, splash resistant, smooth sliding MagSlider Lid to protect your drink from any free flying liquid because surprise speed bumps are very real. column3: >Rambler Jr. is a small and mighty kids bottle over engineered for your little wild ones. This 12 oz. powerhouse inherited double wall vacuum insulation with its rambler predecessors, carrying on the family legacy by locking in ice cold water through backyard campouts and breaks between tag. As a well deserved convenience for you, we made sure its straw cap is leak resistant when closed and both the bottle and cap are dishwasher safe. Plus, it's engineered with a super strong, stainless steel armour that won't flinch through bumps and drops on account of slippery hands.

column3: >The Rambler 18 oz. is a necessary addition to your morning hikes, kayak trips, and daily commutes. This tough bottle is double-wall vacuum insulated to keep your water cold until the last sip, dishwasher safe for easy cleaning and comes standard with the chug cap. With a quick twist, the TripleHaul handle comes off, exposing our shatter resistant, dishwasher safe spout that allows controlled gulps on the go. When it's time for a wash or refill, remove the entire cap to expose the bottles wide mouth.

column3: >Bring on the potholes, quick turns, and backcountry roads because this behemoth travel mug holds enough caffeine for even the biggest coffee drinkers. With an elevated handle and cupholder compatible design, it makes mornings on the road that much easier. Plus, its leak-resistant Stronghold™ Lid easily rotates to fasten for both right-and left-handed users —meaning your daily fuel will stay put when you’re on the go. And since both this travel mug and its lid are dishwasher safe, all you have to do is kick up your feet after a well-traveled day.

column1: Please Note: The Stronghold™ Lid is specially made for the Rambler® 30 oz. Travel Mug and won’t fit other Rambler® Drinkware models. The Travel Mug Stronghold™ Lid has 4 placement options and plays nice with both righties and lefties, just like all our Rambler® Drinkware.
360 Degree Welded Handle: Cup-holder compatible and gives you a firm grip on your beverage of choice.
﻿Double wall vacuum insulation keeps drinks cold to the last drop.
Dishwasher safe: because no one needs more work to do.
No Sweat Design. Prevents condensation, keeping hands dry.
Duracoat Colour. If your rambler comes in a DuraCoat colour, rest assured it won't peel or crack.
Leak Resistant Lid. Twist on, twist off lid backed with dual slider magnet technology to keep your coffee full and worries away. As long as it's closed!
• Caution: Not for use with carbonated beverages and should not be used as storage for food or perishables.

Any tumbler that's coming along for the ride needs to be tough enough to keep up. The 20 oz rambler is made from durable stainless steel with double-wall vacuum insulation to protect your hot or cold beverage at all costs. Like the entire Rambler Family, the 20 oz. Tumbler and its lid are dishwasher safe for easy cleaning. While the magnet on the included MagSlider lid adds an additional barrier of protection for keeping drinks contained and preventing heat or cold from escaping, please note - this magnet component is not leakproof and will not prevent spills.
• 18/8 stainless steel. Made with kitchen-grade stainless steel, so they're puncture and rust resistant.
• Double-wall vacuum insulation. Keeps cold drinks cold and hot drinks hot until the last sip.
• Dishwasher safe. Because no one needs more work to do.
• Shatter-resistant construction. So give the MagSlider Lid all you've got.
• Magnets on the MagSlider lid. Makes for easy opening and closing.
• Cup Holder Compatible. Sized to be by your side through every road trip and morning commute.
• Dimensions: 2 2/4"" W at the bottom, x 3 1/2"" W at the top opening, 6 7/8"" H

yeti-rambler-25-oz-mug-with-straw-lid-king-crab,"YETI Rambler 25 oz. Mug With Straw Lid, King Crab","﻿The supremely insulated Rambler® 25 oz. Mug is the ultimate adventure copilot. Its elevated handle and cup holder compatible design make it perfect for off-road cruising, hydrating through long hours on deck, and all-day iced caffeine kicks. It’s topped with our fan-favourite Straw Lid so you can say goodbye to single-use plastic straws.

Our Rambler Straw Lids are built to last and have a molded-in stopper that holds your straw safely in place. And just like our other Rambler Lids, it’s shatter-resistant, dishwasher-safe, and completely free of BPA.
Please note that this Lid is not for use with hot beverages.

yeti-rambler-42-oz-mug-with-straw-lid-king-crab,"YETI Rambler 42 oz. Mug With Straw Lid, King Crab","

Take hydration head-on with YETI's biggest straw mug ever. From water around the clock to post-workout protein shakes, it's your cupholder co-pilot for sips that don't stop on days that don't either. And with the fan-favourite Straw Lid, you can kiss single-use straws goodbye.

Like all Rambler Drinkware, the mug and lid are dishwasher safe. Rambler straw lids are built to last and have a molded-in stopper that holds your straw safely in place. And just like other rambler straw lids, it's shatter resistant, dishwasher-safe and completely BPA-free.
Please note that this Lid is not for use with hot beverages.
18/8 Stainless Steel. Made with kitchen-grade stainless steel, so it's puncture and rust-resistant.
Double Wall Vacuum Insulation. Keeps drinks cold (or hot) to the last drop.
Dishwasher Safe. Because no one needs more work to do.
Cup Holder Compatible. Safely makes it from point A to B.
No Sweat Design. Sized to be by your side through every road trip and morning commute.
Duracoat Colour. If your rambler drinkware comes in DuraCoat Colour, rest assured it won't peel or crack.

yeti-rambler-64oz-with-chug-cap-king-crab,"YETI Rambler 64oz with Chug Cap, King Crab","<meta charset=""utf-8"">

The Rambler 64 oz. bottle is the long-haul water hauler for adventures without pitstops. Call upon this bottle for ice-cold sips of H20 when the temps soar over 30ºC, and don't worry about condensation making your hands slip
column2: . This baby is engineered with a No Sweat exterior, which means you'll be the only one breaking a sweat. With 64 oz (that's your daily eight servings of water, everybody), this water tower to go is perfect for keeping you hydrated on the move.

column1: Note: Do not use the Rambler bottle chug cap with carbonated beverages or for storage of food or perishables.
18/8 Stainless Steel. Made with kitchen-grade stainless steel, so they're puncture and rust resistant.
Double-Wall Vacuum Insulation. Keeps cold drinks cold and hot drinks hot until the last sip.
Dishwasher Safe. Because no one needs more work to do.
Stainless Steel Handle. Stainless steel handle with rubber grip makes for sturdy, easy transport.
100% Leakproof. Carry it with confidence.

yeti-roadie-24-hard-cooler-king-crab,"YETI Roadie 24 Hard Cooler, King Crab","<meta charset=""utf-8"">

column3: >The Roadie 24 Hard Cooler is a fresh take on a tried-and-true YETI favourite. It's 10% lighter weight, holds 20% more, and even performs 30% better thermally than its legendary predecessor. Plus, we built it tall enough to accommodate critical bottles of wine but slim enough to squeeze behind the driver's or passenger's seat of a cat. Now that's what we call a road trip buddy.

column1: Rotomolded construction. Evolved to be thinner and lighter for easier transport, while still incredibly tough.
Permafrost Insulation. Trusted in Tundra Hard Coolers, capable of keeping ice for days.
Neverfail Hinge System. Interlocking design with hinge pins prevents snapping or breaking.
Quicklatch. Flexible, simple, and built for quick, one-handed cooler access.
Heftyhauler handle. Designed for easy hauling and comfortable carrying.
Wine-Friendly Packing. Internal height is 13"" - so (most) standard wine bottles fit upright, and that goes for two litre soda bottles as well.
• Outside Dimensions: 16 1/2"" W at the top opening, 15 1/4"" W at the bottom, 17 1/2"" H, 14"" D at the top opening, 11 7/8"" D at the bottom
• Inside Dimensions:   12 1/2"" W at the top opening, 10 7/8"" W at the bottom, 13 1/4"" H, 9 1/2"" D at the top opening, 8 1/8"" D at the bottom
• Can hold 18 cans of beer, or 24 pounds of ice (only)

yeti-roadie-cooler-with-wheels-48-king-crab,"YETI Roadie Cooler with Wheels 48, King Crab","<meta charset=""utf-8"">

column3: >The Roadie® 48 Wheeled Cooler is built for navigating tailgate crowds and taking lunches to go, and with the same cold-holding power you'd expect from a Tundra ® Cooler.

column1: Note: This Tundra cooler comes with one dry goods basket.
Fatwall Design. Extra-thick wall holds up to three inches of insulation for unmatched temperature retention.
PermaFrost Insulation. Pressure-injected polyurethane foam in the walls and lid locks in that just-packed temp.
Rotomolded Construction. Makes it armoured to the core and virtually indestructible.
T-Rex Lid Latches. These heavy duty rubber latches are engineered with patented tech, which means busted latches are a bummer of the past.
AnchorPoint Tie Down slots. The Built-in molded tie-down slots promise easy mounting to your boat, trailer, or truck bed.
Neverfail Hinge System. Two hinge pins and interlocking design prevent the hinge from ever breaking.
Interlock™ lid system. Creates a form-fitting barrier against extreme temperatures.
Coldlock Gasket. A freezer-quality gasket circles the length of the lid to block out the heat and lock in the cold. (Or block out the cold and keep in the heat if you're hauling hot meals.)
Lipgrip handles. These streamlined handles stay out of the way to make carrying your catch (or cold ones) less of a chore.
Doublehaul Handles. The military-grade polyester ropes deliver extra durability.
Vortex Drain System. Leakproof, rugged, and designed for quick and easy draining.
Bearfood Non-Slip Feet. Budge resistant padding prevents rogue sliding on the boat or in the backseat.
• Outside Dimensions: 25 3/4"" W at the top opening, 24 1/2"" W at the bottom, 15 3/8"" H, 16 1/8"" D at the top opening, 13 3/8"" D at the bottom
• Inside Dimensions: 19 3/8"" W at the top opening, 18 3/8"" W at the bottom, 10 5/8"" H, 10 3/8"" D at the top opening, 9 3/8 ""D at the bottom
• Can hold 28 cans of beer, or 34 pounds of ice (only)

",YETI,,Equipment,"Coolers, King Crab, New-Arrivals, USA Ready, Yeti",true,Title,Default Title,,,,,YETIROAD48KCR,7220.0,,0,deny,manual,550.00,0.00,true,true,,https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0597/6866/8238/files/yeti-roadie-48-wheels-cooler-king-crab-1.jpg?v=1712089037,1,"",false,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,kg,,,true,,,true,,,true,,,active

yeti-roadie-cooler-with-wheels-60-king-crab,"YETI Roadie Cooler with Wheels 60, King Crab","<meta charset=""utf-8"">

column5: >The Roadie® 60 Wheeled Cooler is built for navigating tailgate crowds and taking lunches to go, and with the same cold-holding power you'd expect from a Tundra ® Cooler.

column1: Note: This Tundra cooler comes with one dry goods basket.
Fatwall Design. Extra-thick wall holds up to three inches of insulation for unmatched temperature retention.
PermaFrost Insulation. Pressure-injected polyurethane foam in the walls and lid locks in that just-packed temp.
Rotomolded Construction. Makes it armoured to the core and virtually indestructible.
T-Rex Lid Latches. These heavy duty rubber latches are engineered with patented tech, which means busted latches are a bummer of the past.
AnchorPoint Tie Down slots. The Built-in molded tie-down slots promise easy mounting to your boat, trailer, or truck bed.
Neverfail Hinge System. Two hinge pins and interlocking design prevent the hinge from ever breaking.
Interlock™ lid system. Creates a form-fitting barrier against extreme temperatures.
Coldlock Gasket. A freezer-quality gasket circles the length of the lid to block out the heat and lock in the cold. (Or block out the cold and keep in the heat if you're hauling hot meals.)
Lipgrip handles. These streamlined handles stay out of the way to make carrying your catch (or cold ones) less of a chore.
Doublehaul Handles. The military-grade polyester ropes deliver extra durability.
Vortex Drain System. Leakproof, rugged, and designed for quick and easy draining.
Bearfood Non-Slip Feet. Budge resistant padding prevents rogue sliding on the boat or in the backseat.
• Inside Dimensions: 18.5"" W X 11.5"" D X 15.8"" H
• Can hold 98 cans of beer, or 68 pounds of ice (only)

column3: >The YETI Tundra 35 is the right size for personal hauls or food for a small crew. It boasts up to three inches of PermaFrost™ Insulation and a rugged rotomolded construction for optimum adventure performance. And it fits nicely in an inner tube, making it the perfect, portable cooler to take tubing down the river.

yeti-tundra-45-hard-cooler-king-crab,"YETI Tundra 45 Hard Cooler, King Crab","

The YETI Tundra 45 combines versatility with durability. This premium cooler is infused with that legendary YETI toughness - a durable rotomolded construction and up to three inches of PermaFrost™ insulation. Which is to say it's built to last and will keep your contents ice-cold even in sweltering conditions, like a triple digit summer day in central Texas. No bowing, cracking or melting here.
Note: This Tundra cooler comes with one dry goods basket.
Fatwall Design. Extra-thick wall holds up to three inches of insulation for unmatched temperature retention.
PermaFrost Insulation. Pressure-injected polyurethane foam in the walls and lid locks in that just-packed temp.
Rotomolded Construction. Makes it armoured to the core and virtually indestructible.
T-Rex Lid Latches. These heavy duty rubber latches are engineered with patented tech, which means busted latches are a bummer of the past.
AnchorPoint Tie Down slots. The Built-in molded tie-down slots promise easy mounting to your boat, trailer, or truck bed.
Neverfail Hinge System. Two hinge pins and interlocking design prevent the hinge from ever breaking.
Interlock™ lid system. Creates a form-fitting barrier against extreme temperatures.
Coldlock Gasket. A freezer-quality gasket circles the length of the lid to block out the heat and lock in the cold. (Or block out the cold and keep in the heat if you're hauling hot meals.)
Lipgrip handles. These streamlined handles stay out of the way to make carrying your catch (or cold ones) less of a chore.
Doublehaul Handles. The military-grade polyester ropes deliver extra durability.
Vortex Drain System. Leakproof, rugged, and designed for quick and easy draining.
Bearfood Non-Slip Feet. Budge resistant padding prevents rogue sliding on the boat or in the backseat.
• Outside Dimensions: 25 3/4"" W at the top opening, 24 1/2"" W at the bottom, 15 3/8"" H, 16 1/8"" D at the top opening, 13 3/8"" D at the bottom
• Inside Dimensions: 19 3/8"" W at the top opening, 18 3/8"" W at the bottom, 10 5/8"" H, 10 3/8"" D at the top opening, 9 3/8 ""D at the bottom
• Can hold 28 cans of beer, or 34 pounds of ice (only)

yeti-lowlands-blanket-king-crab,"YETI Lowlands Blanket, King Crab","<meta charset=""utf-8"">

The Lowlands® Blanket helps transform every outdoor concert, tailgate, or backcountry post-up into your personal base camp. Everything from the waterproof utility layer to the supreme soft, insulated interior was meticulously engineered to create a one-of-a-kind, all-terrain, ultra-comfortable, blanket. And your dog will love it too. It's designed to repel dirt, burrs, and pet hair - so let them sit, lie, and roll around on it as much as they like.
Doubleduty™ Comfort. Durable and waterproof on the outside, padded and insulated on the inside.
Hydrobarrier™ Layer. The waterproof layer is built for the damp dewy.

column2: dry. Throw it in with the laundry. End of story.

column1: Pet protected. Supremely soft, and easily shakes off pet hair.
yeti-daytrip-lunch-bag-agave-teal,"YETI Daytrip Lunch Bag, Agave Teal","<meta charset=""utf-8"">

column3: >Pack a lunch you'll actually look forward to with the Daytrip Lunch Bag. In true YETI fashion, we upgraded a classic form factor to give you a fresh-for-hours, fold and go, easy to clean lunch bag that takes soggy sandwiches and lukewarm drinks off the menu. Did we mention it's lined with hours worth of insulation power? Surprise.

column1: Please note: This product does not come with a YETI ICE
Coldcell Flex Insulation. A lightweight, closed cell foam flexibility folds over while offering superior temperature holding power.
Food safe. From fruit to subs - it's all safe to store.
Thermo Snap Closure. Magnetic closure will keep your tacos hot or your cold cuts, well, cold.
Fold-and-go packing. Once dining is done, fold it up, hook it closed, and stow it away.
Adjustable grid. Decide the size of your lunch bag by sliding the closing hook into one of the loops.
• Dimensions (unfolded): 14.6 cm D x 34.3 cm H x 22.2 cm W
• Dimensions (folded): 14.6 cm D x 22.2 cm H x 22.2 cm W

column3: >Meet the leakproof, tough-as-nails, carry-the-day soft cooler. Around here, we call it the Hopper Flip 12. Its wide-mouth opening makes for easy loading and access to your food and drinks. Its compact, cubed body means ultimate portability - go off road, onto the water, and back again with this personal cooler. And its extreme insulation means your ice is staying ice.

column1: Dryhide shell. The Hopper's high-density fabric is waterproof and resistant to mildew, punctures, and UV rays. The liner is made from an FDA-approved food-grade material.

Hydrolok Zipper. The toughest, highest-performing waterproof and leakproof cooler zipper in the world.
Wide mouth opening. Allows easy access and visibility to your contents.
Hitchpoint Grid. Easily attach pretty much anything, including the MOLLE Zinger &

• Can hold 13 cans of beer, or 16 pounds of ice (only)

yeti-rambler-20-oz-stackable-cup-with-magslider-lid-black,"YETI Rambler 20 oz. Stackable Cup with Magslider Lid, Black","<meta charset=""utf-8"">

column3: >A daily driver for whatever you're drinking. This versatile vessel pulls its weight around the fire, keeping coffee warm until the last sip and beers cold until the keg is tapped. The cup holder friendly Rambler 20 oz. stackable cup comes with the splash resistant, MagSlider™ Lid to protect your beverage while on the go. Like the entire Rambler family, it's over engineered to survive extreme adventures and double-wall insulated so your beer is ice cold or your coffee is hot from the first sip to the last.
>Please note: This magnet slider is not leakproof and will not prevent spills.

column3: >A daily driver for whatever you're drinking. This versatile vessel pulls its weight around the fire, keeping coffee warm until the last sip and beers cold until the keg is tapped. The cup holder friendly Rambler 20 oz. stackable cup comes with the splash resistant, MagSlider™ Lid to protect your beverage while on the go. Like the entire Rambler family, it's over engineered to survive extreme adventures and double-wall insulated so your beer is ice cold or your coffee is hot from the first sip to the last.
>Please note: This magnet slider is not leakproof and will not prevent spills.
data-mce-style=""font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'San Francisco', 'Segoe UI', Roboto, 'Helvetica Neue', sans-serif

yeti-rambler-30-oz-stackable-cup-with-magslider-lid-black,"YETI Rambler 30 oz. Stackable Cup with Magslider Lid, Black","<meta charset=""utf-8"">

The vacuum insulated rambler 887 ml stackable cup is sized perfectly for fewer refills of Texas-sized teas, H20, and XL coffee. It keeps your drink at the right temperature and comes with the fan-favourite MagSlider™ Lid to protect your beverage from splashing. When you're ready to store it away, save space by removing the lid and stacking it on top of another one just like it.
Please note: This magnet slider is not leakproof and will not prevent spills.

Please note: This magnet slider is not leakproof and will not prevent spills.

column1: Keep your coffee fresh and ready to go with the I.XXI coffee storage canister. This canister is sealed with a one-way valve, keeping oxygen out and preserving the flavours of your coffee or tea.

• Stainless steel container. Durable, restaurant grade stainless steel body resists staining and odour retention and blocks UV rays.

i-xxi-knock-box-blue,"I.XXI Knock Box with Nonslip Base, Blue","

This practical little gadget makes clearing out your espresso machine's portafilter a breeze. Just whack your portafilter against the soft knock bar to toss out a used coffee puck into the bowl, for a tidier and easier way to discard grounds. With a space saving compact size, this knock box is ideal for any home coffee bar.
• Dimensions: 13.5 cm W x 12.3 cm H (15 cm W at top)
• Soft non-slip base and soft knock bar to minimize noise

We all know the importance of proper puck prep before pulling a shot, but did you know that one of the main culprits of channeling can often stem from an uneven distribution of water from your machine's group head during extraction? This tends to be very common, particularly in prosumer machines, and can reek havoc on your shots if left unchecked.

The job of a puck screen is to act as a mediator between the group head and the coffee, interrupting and diverting the high-pressure streams of water for a much more controlled, balanced flow through your grounds.
Note: Dose amount may need to be modified/reduced to accommodate the thickness of the puck screen.

la-marzocco-linea-micra-espresso-machine-stainless-steel,"La Marzocco Linea Micra Espresso Machine, Stainless Steel","

A compact, easy-to-use home espresso machine with the powerful performance worthy of the La Marzocco name. Designed as a scaled-down version of the Linea Classic S, the Linea Micra combines a dynamic feature set and small body that allows you to explore the world of espresso. Easy setup, quick heat-up time, and all the essential tools, the Linea Micra makes dialing in your morning routine simple.
Simplicity. A long lineage. The Linea Micra makes for a simple, easy-to-use espresso machine inspired by the Linea family. Focus on the process.
Consistency. With double-boilers, PID, and full temperature control, you can count on deliciously-crafted espresso drinks—shot-to-shot, day-to-day, and year-to-year.

Legacy. A lineage of espresso history. Featuring the same clean lines as the Linea Classic S, you can make espresso on a machine that is connected to the Linea lineup for over 40 years.within reach
Everything you need to brew café quality espresso at a moment’s notice.

Convertible portafilter.
The all-new convertible portafilter allows you to easily change between a single-spout, double-spout, and bottomless portafilter. Compatible with all La Marzocco Home machines along with standard 58mm tampers.

Ready, set, brew. Dial in your morning routine. A quick heat-up time, simple setup, and all the tools you need to enjoy café-quality espresso at home.

Small &
column2: mighty. Café-quality equipment packaged into a compact 12” x 12” x 15” form. It’s easy to make Micra the centerpiece of the kitchen.

column1:
la-marzocco-linea-micra-espresso-machine-black,"La Marzocco Linea Micra Espresso Machine, Black","

A compact, easy-to-use home espresso machine with the powerful performance worthy of the La Marzocco name. Designed as a scaled-down version of the Linea Classic S, the Linea Micra combines a dynamic feature set and small body that allows you to explore the world of espresso. Easy setup, quick heat-up time, and all the essential tools, the Linea Micra makes dialing in your morning routine simple.
Simplicity. A long lineage. The Linea Micra makes for a simple, easy-to-use espresso machine inspired by the Linea family. Focus on the process.
Consistency. With double-boilers, PID, and full temperature control, you can count on deliciously-crafted espresso drinks—shot-to-shot, day-to-day, and year-to-year.

Legacy. A lineage of espresso history. Featuring the same clean lines as the Linea Classic S, you can make espresso on a machine that is connected to the Linea lineup for over 40 years.within reach
Everything you need to brew café quality espresso at a moment’s notice.

Convertible portafilter.
The all-new convertible portafilter allows you to easily change between a single-spout, double-spout, and bottomless portafilter. Compatible with all La Marzocco Home machines along with standard 58mm tampers.

Ready, set, brew. Dial in your morning routine. A quick heat-up time, simple setup, and all the tools you need to enjoy café-quality espresso at home.

Small &
column2: mighty. Café-quality equipment packaged into a compact 12” x 12” x 15” form. It’s easy to make Micra the centerpiece of the kitchen.
cleaning basket, Standard European La Marzocco Convex Tamper, Installation Guide/ User Guide, Convertible Portafilter, Purocaf Cleaning Solution, 12 oz Pitcher

crema-tamping-mat-for-breville-bambino-plus,Crema Tamping Mat for Breville Bambino Plus,"

Pull the mat from the drip tray, tamp like there's no tomorrow, and tuck the mat conveniently back into it's home, protecting the tray from damage. And with our built-in vent and drip tray holes, it's business as usual with the mat in place on the tray.
Protect your workspace. The Tamping Mat provides a firm, secure place to use your Tamper &
column2: Distributor Combo, ensuring no damage to your countertops.

column1: Protect Your Drip Tray. When not in use, the tamping mat fits perfectly on your Breville Bambino Plus, keeping things clean and protected.
Precision Crafted. The Tamping Mat never gets in the way with its built-in holes and vent tray designed to work perfectly with your machine.
Crema Coffee Products is not affiliated, associated, authorized, endorsed by, or in any way connected with Breville Pty Limited (Breville), or any of its subsidiaries or its affiliates.

delonghi-la-specialista-opera-espresso-machine-ec9555m,DeLonghi La Specialista Opera Espresso Machine #EC9555M,"

Enjoy an authentic coffee experience at home with La Specialista Opera, for quality coffee in every cup. Designed to deliver a rich taste every time, this manual coffee maker uses technology that supports you at each stage of the coffee making process, keeping you in control, effortlessly. Discover a range of hot and cold drinks, including the De'Longhi exclusive Espresso Cool.

column3: >PID. Active temperature control with PID maintains water temperature throughout brewing.
column5: >More Grind Settings. Integrated grinder with 15 grind settings and 3 infusion temperature profiles.
column7: >Cold Extraction. Make a Cold Brew in under 5 minutes* and try the new Espresso Cool.
column9: >

column3: >Tamping Consistency. Smart Tamping Station reduces mess and ensures precision.
>Insulated Steam Wand. Cool-touch steam wand for improved safety and cleanability.
>Fast heat-up time.
column5: >The advanced thermoblock ensures the coffee machine is ready to use in under 20 seconds.

column1: Advanced Thermoblock Heating System (ALU/SS Thermoblocks- coffee and steam)
Single and double espresso, espresso cool, cold brew, americano, hot milk, hot water
14.9"" W x 14.5"" D x 17.5"" H

For detailed care instructions, please refer to your machine's user manual. To download your machine's user manual click here. We recommend that you also incorporate the following into your cleaning routine:
• Descale when the machine prompts you, approximately every 3-6 months. We recommend using DeLonghi EcoDecalk.
• Perform a backflushing/cleaning cycle when the machine prompts you. We recommend using Cafiza tablets.
• Soap out water tank (if applicable) and drip tray every few days.
• Keep the stainless steel casing shiny with a microfiber cloth.
• Remove coffee oil build up in your portafilter and baskets by soaking them in hot water and one backflushing tablet once a week. We recommend using Cafiza tablets for this.
• Replace your DeLonghi DLS C002 every 2-3 months.
2 year warranty from DeLonghi, plus 1 extra year if you register your machine with DeLonghi.

column2:
claims, call DeLonghi at 1-800-322-3848 or visit the DeLonghi Website for DeLonghi Support.

For faster service when you call, please have the following readily available: Provide the product model number (listed above) and the batch code (this is a 3 to 4 digit number). These numbers are usually located on the back, underside, or behind the water tank of the product, either on a sticker or an imprinted graphic. Have an original or a copy of the sales receipt.

delonghi-dedica-maestro-plus-espresso-machine-ec885m,"DeLonghi Dedica Maestro Plus Espresso Machine, Metal #EC950M","

Designed to provide a simple, authentic brewing experience, the DeLonghi Dedica Maestro Plus features the auto LatteArt automatic steam wand. This compact espresso machine saves space without sacrificing quality. With a hands on crafting experience and an automatic steam wand, the Dedica Maestro Plus is the perfect addition to any countertop.

Ideal Pressure. Dedica Maestro Plus has a 15 bar Italian pump that delivers perfect pressure, which is essential during the brewing process, from low pressure during pre-infusion, to the optimal 9 bar of high pressure during extraction.

Automatic Steam Wand. Effortlessly achieve the perfect microtextured foam for quality lattes and cappuccinos - with milk or your favorite milk alternatives. With 3 different temperatures and 3 milk foam textures (latte art, fine, and dense), Auto LatteArt helps you get the perfect frothed milk for crafting drinks and creating latte art.
Fast Heat Up. Advanced Thermoblock technology reaches the optimum brewing temperature in seconds after powering on, allowing you to brew your perfect drink quickly.

Active Temperature Control. With 3 infusion temperature settings, Active Temperature Control technology ensures stable water temperature and control throughout the whole brewing process at the touch of a button. Customize temperature settings to match water infusion temperature to beans for the optimal attraction. Different coffee bean varieties with different roasting levels require their own specific temperature setting for the best extraction.

column2: Easy Cleanup. At just 7.5"" wide, the compact espresso machine design saves space without sacrificing quality, making it the perfect addition to any countertop. The fully stainless steel finish and detachable dishwasher safe parts make cleanup a breeze, leaving you more time to enjoy your drink.

column1: Removable Water Tank. The 54 oz. water tank is easy to remove, refill and reattach. With the clear tank, easily view the water level and eliminate the guesswork. Brew multiple cups without having to worry about refilling.

Brew like a pro. This machine includes a professional tamper, stainless steel portafilter, stainless steel milk jug, and both single and double wall filter baskets for single and double shots. With the single and double wall filter baskets, get the most from your beans. The single wall basket allows you to brew like a pro, giving you greater control, and leaving you with a more complex, richer espresso, while the double wall basket is more forgiving, better suited for beginners and store-bought pre-ground coffee beans.

column2: >Tamper, stainless steel portafilter, stainless steel milk jug, single wall filter baskets (single and double shot baskets), double wall filter baskets (single and double shot baskets)

column3: Single Espresso, Hot Milk / frothed milk

column2: >Active temperature control, Steam wand settings (latte art, fine, dense)

bravilor-sego-12-automatic-espresso-machine,Bravilor Bonamat Sego 12 Bean-To-Cup Automatic Espresso Machine,"

The Sego 12 is a fully automatic espresso machine. The Sego can be placed literally anywhere, thanks to the small format, clear and easy user interface.
Bravilor Bonamat has carefully selected, assembled and pre-programmed the most popular speciality coffees for you. So your machine will quickly be up and running.

The quality of your cup of coffee is important. That’s why essential components requiring maintenance were carefully and cleverly designed in-house. Bravilor Bonamat ensures that cleaning activities are kept to a minimum and performed automatically as much as possible.
• Three canisters: One for coffee beans and two for instant ingredients, such as topping or cocoa.
• Simple operation thanks to the intuitive touchscreen.
• The menu offers up to 30 choices of beverage.
• Settings, such as water temperature, contact time, coffee grinding and cup size, can be adapted to your wishes.
• The Sego is well suited for offices, waiting rooms and shops.
• The energy-saving mode recudes your energy consumption when the machine is not in use.

column2: >Three cup sizes, from 6 oz to 10 oz.

column5: data-mce-fragment=""1"">Up to 30 beverage options including coffee crema, espresso, double espresso, americano, latte, cappuccino, cafe mocha, moccachino, latte macchiato, hot chocolate, hot chocolate deluxe, hot water, hot milk shot / steamer

bravilor-bonamat-sego-12-riser-set,Bravilor Bonamat Sego 12 Riser Set,"

Increase the application options of the Sego 12 with the riser set. Takes just minutes to install and retro-fits with all Sego 12's.
<li>4 piece set: waste bin, drip tray, cup grid &amp
• Increases cup clearance to fit 12 oz. cups.
• New cup grid enhances the appearance of the dispensing area
• The pedestal raises the standard Sego 12 by 2.36"" / 60mm. Increases total height to 25.59"".
• The larger waste bin holds approximately 40 waste coffee pucks.
• The larger drip tray has room for more rinsing water, which means it needs emptying less frequently.
• The lower drip tray grid raises the tap height from 4.13"" to 5.31""

ember-mug2-temperature-control-mug-14-oz-black,"Ember Mug2 Temperature Control Mug 14 oz., Black","<meta charset=""utf-8"">

Designed for home or office, the new Ember Mug2 does more than simply keep your coffee hot. This smart mug allows you to set an exact drinking temperature, so your coffee is never too hot, or too cold.

Ember then maintains your chosen temperature for up to 80 minutes with the Ember Mug2 14 oz - so your hot beverage stays perfect. Ember Mug2 is safe to hand wash and submersible up to 1 meter in water.
Smart LED. Indicates when beverage has reached its perfect temperature and more.
Built-In Battery. Keeps your drink hot for 80 minutes, or all day when placed on charging coaster.
Auto Sleep. Intelligently senses when to turn on and off.
Temperature Range. 120°F - 145°F (50°C - 62.5 °C). Select your temperature with the Ember app.

Precision in the palm of your hands. Ember is a connected device. Use the Ember app to set your temperature, customize presets for your favourite drinks, receive notifications when your desired temperature is reached, personalize your mug and more.
• Dimensions: 4.60"" H x 3.46"" W (4.5"" W with handle)
• Recharge the battery with the included charging coaster

ember-travel-mug2-temperature-control-travel-mug-12-oz-black,"Ember Travel Mug2+ Temperature Control Travel Mug 12 oz., Black","<meta charset=""utf-8"">

Designed to be used on-the-go, the Ember Travel Mug 2 does more than simply keep your coffee hot. This smart heated travel mug allows you to set an exact drinking temperature and keeps it there for up to 3 hours, so your coffee is never too hot, or too cold.
Ember Travel mug 2 is easy to clean and is safe to hand wash and submersible up to 1 meter in water. The leak-proof lid is dishwasher safe.

Plus, this mug is compatible with Apple® Find My network! This is an easy, secure way to locate your Ember Travel Mug 2+ on a map using the Find My app on your iPhone, iPad, or mac, or the find items app on your apple watch.
Touch display. Increase or decrease your temperature on the go by tapping the + or - symbol.
Built-In Battery. Heats your drink for 3 hours, or all day when placed on the charging coaster.
Auto Sleep. Intelligently senses when to turn on and off.
Temperature Range. 120°F - 145°F (50°C - 62.5°C). Select your temperature on the mug or with the Ember app.

Precision in the palm of your hands. Ember is a connected device. Use the Ember app to set your temperature, customize presets for your favourite drinks, receive notifications when your desired temperature is reached, personalize your mug and more.
• Use the touch display on the mug to increase or decrease temperature
• Recharge the battery with the included charging coaster
• Works with the Ember App, as well as Apple Find My on iOS devices

ember-travel-mug-car-charger,Ember Travel Mug Car Charger,"<meta charset=""utf-8"">

Now you can maintain your Ember Travel Mug's perfect temperature even longer with the Ember Car Charger. Ensure your Ember Travel Mug stays fully charged for your longest road trip or commute, so it is always ready when you are.
Compatible with all 1st and 2nd generation Ember Travel Mugs
Ember Car Charger plugs into car via 12V power outlet (cigarette lighter)
Fits in most standard cup holders
Smart LED Indicators: Adapter LED light is solid white when powered on, green when mug is fully charged, breathing red when charging the mug
Includes cable winder. Pull both cable ends simultaneously to adjust the desired length.
• For use with the Ember 1, 2 and 2+ travel mug only
ember-14-oz-mug-sliding-lid,Ember 14 oz. Mug 2 Sliding Lid,"<meta charset=""utf-8"">
Your perfect warmth - extended. Keep your Ember mug splash-free, while extending the battery life to keep your drink warmer for longer.
Compatible with Ember Mug 2, 14 oz (414ml). Not compatible with Ember Travel Mug.

la-marzocco-linea-mni-espresso-machine-black,"La Marzocco Linea Mini Espresso Machine, Black","

The Linea Mini, re-imagined by La Marzocco to inspire both the seasoned barista and the curious explorer, turns every espresso moment into an experience. With updated aesthetics—including the Della Pietra Curve, soft touch accessories—and advanced workflow features like Brew-by-Weight, a new pre-infusion system, and easy pump pressure adjustment—the new Linea Mini blends tradition with innovation. Created to be a tool for those who dream of crafting the perfect espresso, and a companion for adventures at home and beyond. The Linea Mini looks as beautiful as it performs, ready to serve anywhere for years to come.

column3:
>Dual Boilers and PID Temperature Control. Dual boilers and PID control for perfect espresso shots.

Easy Pressure Adjustment. Easily adjustable pump pressure for tailored espresso extraction.

Built-in Shot Timer. Integrated shot timer for precise espresso monitoring.

Rinse Mode for Efficient Cleaning. Rinse mode for easy and efficient cleaning.

Auto Back Flush and Standby Mode. Automatic backflushing and customizable standby for maintenance.

Barista Lights. Dedicated barista lights for precision and aesthetics.

Group Cap Adopted From Commercial Espresso Machines.Commercial-grade group cap for professional performance.

Semi-Automatic Paddle. Manual paddle interface with electronic pre-infusion, inspired by 1970s La Marzocco machines.

Cool Touch Steam Wand. Cool-touch steam wand with PEEK polymer tip for safety.

La Marzocco Home App Integration. Connect with the La Marzocco Home App for advanced features.

Pre-Infusion System. Two valve pre-infusion system for soft saturation and self-cleaning.

Hybrid Mode for Plumbed Machines. Flexible brewing with traditional and new pre-infusion phases.

Extended Timeout Period. Extended timeout for customized pre-infusion up to 99 seconds.Specifications

la-marzocco-linea-mini-espresso-machine-stainless-steel,"La Marzocco Linea Mini Espresso Machine, Stainless Steel","

The Linea Mini, re-imagined by La Marzocco to inspire both the seasoned barista and the curious explorer, turns every espresso moment into an experience. With updated aesthetics—including the Della Pietra Curve, soft touch accessories—and advanced workflow features like Brew-by-Weight, a new pre-infusion system, and easy pump pressure adjustment—the new Linea Mini blends tradition with innovation. Created to be a tool for those who dream of crafting the perfect espresso, and a companion for adventures at home and beyond. The Linea Mini looks as beautiful as it performs, ready to serve anywhere for years to come.

column3:
>Dual Boilers and PID Temperature Control. Dual boilers and PID control for perfect espresso shots.

Easy Pressure Adjustment. Easily adjustable pump pressure for tailored espresso extraction.

Built-in Shot Timer. Integrated shot timer for precise espresso monitoring.

Rinse Mode for Efficient Cleaning. Rinse mode for easy and efficient cleaning.

Auto Back Flush and Standby Mode. Automatic backflushing and customizable standby for maintenance.

Barista Lights. Dedicated barista lights for precision and aesthetics.

Group Cap Adopted From Commercial Espresso Machines.Commercial-grade group cap for professional performance.

Semi-Automatic Paddle. Manual paddle interface with electronic pre-infusion, inspired by 1970s La Marzocco machines.

Cool Touch Steam Wand. Cool-touch steam wand with PEEK polymer tip for safety.

La Marzocco Home App Integration. Connect with the La Marzocco Home App for advanced features.

Pre-Infusion System. Two valve pre-infusion system for soft saturation and self-cleaning.

Hybrid Mode for Plumbed Machines. Flexible brewing with traditional and new pre-infusion phases.

Extended Timeout Period. Extended timeout for customized pre-infusion up to 99 seconds.Specifications

column1:
planet-bean-full-city-swp-decaf-whole-bean-coffee-12-oz,"Planet Bean Peru Cafe Feminino SWP Decaf, Whole Bean Coffee 12 oz.","

A mellow medium roast decaf with medium body, fuity notes, and a chocolate finish.
This is whole bean coffee, need your coffee ground? Check out out grind selection chart to choose your perfect grind for your brewing needs.

Roast level: Medium Roast

Tasting notes: Mild acidity, fruity aroma with notes of cherry and chocolate

Planet Bean began roasting coffee in downtown Guelph in 1997. Ours was the first roastery in the city for at least half a century. From the beginning our focus was on certified fairtrade and organic gourmet arabica coffee. The scent of our coffee roastery became a part of the downtown experience and was an aromatic beacon for anyone with a fine sense of flavour. Although Planet Bean has moved shop a few times and changed its structure and expanded, it is still Guelphs premier and primo coffee company.
The Swiss Water Decaffeination process uses no organic solvents
column2:
only water is used to decaffeinate beans, a technique first developed in Switzerland in 1933.

The process uses green coffee extract (GCE) for the caffeine extraction mechanism. Green coffee extract is a solution containing the water-soluble components of green coffee except for the caffeine, obtained by soaking green coffee beans in hot water, then filtering through an activated charcoal filter to remove the caffeine molecules. Fresh beans containing both caffeine and the other components are added to the GCE solution, where the gradient pressure difference between the GCE (which is caffeine-deficient) and the green coffee (which is caffeine-rich) causes the caffeine molecules to migrate from the green coffee into the GCE. Because GCE is saturated with the other water-soluble components of green coffee, only the caffeine molecule migrates to the GCE
column3: the other water-soluble coffee elements are retained in the green coffee. The newly caffeine-rich GCE solution is then passed through the activated carbon filters to remove the caffeine again, and the process is repeated. The continuous batch process takes 8–10 hours to meet the final residual decaffeinated target.

column1:
100% Organic Arabica swiss water process decaf whole bean coffee

philips-series-3300-lattego-iced-coffee-automatic-espresso-machine,Philips Series 3300 LatteGo & Iced Coffee Automatic Espresso Machine,"

Philips 3300 Series fully automatic Silent Brew espresso machine with LatteGo &
column2: Iced Coffee -  Offers 6 delicious (coffees espresso, cappuccino, Americano, latte machiatto and regular coffee) + iced coffees from fresh beans, with ease, thanks to the intuitive touch display, plus a hot water option with the Philips 3000 LatteGo with Iced Coffee machine. Equipped with a dedicated iced coffee setting that reduces brew temperature and lowers flow rate, the 3000 Iced Coffee makes superautomatic coffee cooler than ever. Simply add ice to your cup before hitting the dedicated Iced Coffee specialty button and you're on your way to cold coffee comfort.

column1: This 3300 also comes equipped with the well-loved LatteGo milk system, a 3-piece external milk system that offers one-touch automatic steaming and effortless cleaning. This labor-less cleaning creation couples with self-regulating water filtration and front-access to refill beans and water on the fly. The 3300's convenience continues with dedicated cappuccino and latte buttons alongside its options for iced coffee and espresso. This one-touch robo-rista will have you mug-in-hand and on your morning commute in minutes.

Easily make aromatic coffee varieties like Espresso, Coffee, Cappuccino Iced Coffee and Latte Macchiato at the touch of a button. LatteGo tops milk varieties with silky smooth froth, is easy to set up and can be cleaned in as little as 15 seconds.

Enjoy 6 hot and refreshing drinks with one touch. Enjoy 5 popular coffee recipes, classic espresso, regular black coffee, cappuccino, latte macchiato and iced coffee, with the prefect crema, aroma and temperature. Hot water for tea is also available. Our unique brewing system perfectly extracts the beans' flavours with a slower flow rate and at a lower temperature. Add ice cubes to your drink and enjoy a delicious iced coffee, with no compromise on coffee intensity.

Silky smooth milk froth thanks to high speed LatteGo system. Top your coffee off with a silky-smooth layer of milk froth. The LatteGo mixes milk and air at high speed in the round frothing chamber, then adds a splash free, creamy layer of milk froth to your cup at just the right temperature.

40% quieter with SilentBrew, same delicious coffee. Our patented SilentBrew technology reduces machine sounds so you can enjoy the experience of brewing aromatic coffee more. Using sound shielding and quiet grinding, our machines make 40% less noise than earlier models and come with a Quiet Mark certification.

Easy instructions and inspiration with the Coffee+ App. Discover all there is to know about your fully automatic espresso machine and unlock a world of unlimited inspiration with café-like recipes in the Coffee+ app.​

Easy coffee selection and customization. Easily select your favourite drinks thanks to the modern touch screen display with coloured icons. Adjust your coffee your way with the My Coffee Choice function: choose your preferred coffee strength, length and milk froth level, just to your taste.

The perfect temperature, aroma and crema cup after cup. The Aroma Extract system intelligently strikes the optimum balance between brewing temperature and aroma extraction by keeping the water temperature between 90 and 98C, while regulating the water flow rate, so you can enjoy delicious coffees.

Enriched flavour with our hard-wearing ceramic grinder. Bring out the full flavour of your coffee with our hard-wearing ceramic grinder. The durable ceramic grinder can be adjusted in 12 steps, from fine to coarse grindings.
LatteGo is exceptionally easy to clean: 2 parts, no tubes. Our 2 parts milk system has no tubes or hidden parts and can be cleaned in as little as 15 seconds under tap* or in the dishwasher.

Up to 5000 cups without descaling thanks to AquaClean. Our patented innovation, AquaClean water filter, ensures you make the most out of your fully automatic coffee machine. By changing the filter at machine request, you will not need to descale your machine for up to 5000* cups, while enjoying clear and purified water. Once AquaClean is installed in your coffee machine, the descaling notification alarm is automatically deactivated.

Easy cleaning thanks to fully removable brew group. The brew group is the heart of every fully automatic coffee machine, and should be cleaned regularly. The removable brew group allows you to clean it thoroughly just by rinsing it under the tap.

Keep your beans fresh for longer thanks to the aroma seal. The new Aroma seal protects your favourite coffee beans and makes sure they preserve their original aroma over time, while reducing the grinder noise.
AquaClean Filter, Grease tube, measuring scoop, water hardness test strip, LatteGo storage lid

flair-neo-flex-manual-espresso-brewer,"Flair Neo Flex Manual Espresso Brewer, Black","

The NEO Flex is the beginner home barista's dream. Two different portafilters allow for brewing with convenience or control, and reduce the dial-in process and need for additional equipment. This is simple, affordable espresso.

The NEO Flex is the perfect combination of affordability and capability, a true home espresso maker for everyone and anyone. The NEO Flex frame is constructed of polycarbonate, meaning the frame is durable and lightweight, and it comes with two different portafilters, the Flow-Control and Bottomless 2-in-1, to ensure each home barista can brew exactly how they want.

column3: >Flow-Control Portafilter
column5: >: Perfect for espresso beginners, the Flow-Control Portafilter features a restricted exit port, meaning the portafilter does the work of building the appropriate pressure needed for an espresso extraction. No dial-in required – just simple espresso brewing.

column3: >Bottomless 2-in-1 Portafilter
column5: >: Perfect for when espresso brewers are ready to control their extraction more. This portafilter requires a high-quality, espresso capable burr grinder, but means that home baristas can control the variables of each shot, and ensure their espresso if to their exacting standards.

flair-classic-manual-espresso-maker,Flair Classic Manual Espresso Maker,"

THE ORIGINAL... THE CLASSIC

The Flair Classic is the original manual espresso maker that turned the craft coffee industry on its head in 2016. The completely manual, lever espresso press is capable of brewing between 6-9 BAR pressure, exactly what is needed to brew cafe-quality espresso from wherever you are.

The unique design of the Flair makes it the best way to craft, by hand, a rich, full-bodied, café-quality espresso at home. It's also portable, durable, easy to maintain, and a lot of fun to use. Comes complete in a custom carrying case making it easy to take it anywhere you go or to pack up after use. Includes a bottomless 2-in-1 portafilter for spouted or naked brewing.

Handcrafted Espresso. With the Flair Classic Espresso Maker, you have a complete manual espresso machine that can produce professional quality shots of espresso from your home, or wherever you are. Add 60ml of boiled water and a dose of up to 18g of ground coffee to yield a 40ml shot with beautiful crema. A burr grinder is essential for use with this product.

column2: Completely Beautiful. The Flair Classic is a 100% human-powered, direct lever espresso press. There are no plugs or electronics, meaning the Flair will look beautiful in any coffee station or kitchen.

column1: Advanced Espresso Brewing. The Flair Classic comes with a bottomless 2-in-1 portafilter, meaning you can brew bottomless or spouted. Add the FLAIR Pressure Gauge Kit to ensure perfect, repeatable extractions.

Easy to Clean. The Flair Espresso Maker is the only manual espresso maker with a completely detachable brewing head. This patented design allows for users to completely remove the brewing head, separate the parts, and rinse under cool water.

Built to Last. The Flair Classic is made from durable materials like cast aluminum and stainless steel, you can be sure your manual espresso maker, by Flair, is built to last. Both the aluminum press stand and the stainless steel brewing head are backed by a 3-year warranty.
Fully Portable. All Flair Classic Espresso Makers come standard with our precision cut and padded carrying case meaning you can take your manual espresso maker anywhere you'd like.
Each Classic comes with everything you need to brew cafe-quality espresso, anytime, anywhere, including 2-in-1 dose cup and tamper as well as a carrying case.

df64e-espresso-grinder-with-dlc-burrs-black,"DF64E Espresso Grinder with DLC Burrs, Black","

From the same team that brought you the DF64 ELR

The DF64E combines large 64mm Italian made burrs with a powerful 250W motor to deliver consistency, minimum clumping and a fluffy grind that is usually only found in grinders double its price. The DF64E can be used as a single dose grinder with the included bellow or as a traditional grinder with the 225g hopper and the touch screen with programmable doses.
The extremely low retention (ELR), stepless adjustment and beautiful wood accents make it a perfect grinder for any home espresso setup.
The DF64E is an espresso ONLY grinder due to the limited adjustment range.

Note: The use of oily beans in this grinder can cause the grinder to clog over time. We recommend using beans that are less oily. If you use oily beans the grinder will need to be cleaned more often to avoid clogging.

flair-pro-2-manual-espresso-maker-black,"Flair Pro 2 Manual Espresso Maker, Black","

PROFESSIONAL GRADE ESPRESSO EXTRACTIONS!
Brew like a PRO with espresso anywhere! The Flair PRO 2 is the highest level of manual espresso that maintains a portable package.

Raising the bar on manual espresso makers, the Flair PRO 2 maintains all the performance of the original Flair PRO, featuring four upgrades including a removable spout, an enhanced bottomless portafilter, a gauge guard for increased durability and a silicone grip for better brewing ergonomics. These upgrades come standard on all PRO 2 Espresso Makers and build upon the best in class features of the original PRO, like an integrated pressure gauge for enhanced pressure profiling, expand capacity for brew ratios, and an enhanced stainless steel experience featuring an all stainless steel brewing head and a two-piece drip tray. The PRO 2 still features a copper-plated portafilter base and is available in black or white.

Your favourite manual espresso maker, upgraded. The Flair Pro 2 features 4 key upgrades from the original Pro, including an improved bottomless portafilter, a removable stainless steel spout, a silicone handle grip for brewing ergonomics and a silicone protective wrap to improve gauge durability.
Portable Package. The Flair Pro 2 comes with a portable carrying case, so you can take it with you wherever you go.
Integrated pressure gauge. For enhanced pressure profiling.
Stainless Steel parts. This brewer features an all stainless steel brewing head as well as a flashy two-piece drip tray.
Stainless Steel Portafilter. Brew naked or spouted.

flair-58-manual-espresso-maker-black,"Flair 58 Manual Espresso Maker, Black","

THE GOLD STANDARD IN MANUAL ESPRESSO!
Unlock the true potential of your extraction with the Flair 58. A fully-manual, professional grade, lever espresso press.

The Flair 58 features Flair's first industry standard 58mm portafilter as well as a more robust frame and lever for ease of extractions at higher pressures. The 58 also includes a Preheat Temperature Controller. Just set your brew head to one of three heat settings to ensure proper preheat and thermal control for every shot. The 58 utilizes stainless steel components for a plastic-free brew path, married to a durable, die-cast aluminum frame to withstand years of extractions. This premium build is coupled with elegant finishes, such as chrome plating and deluxe wooden accents.
Please Note: All of our current units now include the new Valve Plunger design, Puck Screen &
Detatchable Pre-heat controller. So you can brew anywhere.
Ready to use right out of the box. Comes with all of the accessories &
column2: gear you need to begin brewing espresso at home.

column1: Low Flow 18 Gram Basket. Perfect for any home brewers kit, this basket allows for a dose range between 16-22 grams.

Flair 58 base, flair 58 lever assembly with shot mirror ready post, flair 58 brew head with valve plunger and detatchable PCB, puck screen, flair 58 pressure gauge with stainless steel stem, 58mm portafilter and 16-22 gram basket, detachable preheat controller (PCB controller, power supply box, wall outlet), 58mm tamper, Flair 58 Drip Tray, Flair 58 Quick Start Guide

1 year limited warranty through Flair.

",Flair,,Equipment,"Artisanal Coffee Brewers, Artisanal Coffee Brewing, Artisanal Sale, Brewing Equipment, Electrics, Espresso Machines, Manual Espresso Machines, Manufacturer Warranty, New-Arrivals, No Grinder, No Milk, Specialty Coffee Makers",true,Title,Default Title,,,,,EFLAIR58,3629.0,,0,deny,manual,795.00,0.00,true,true,,https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0597/6866/8238/files/flair-58-espresso-maker-black-1.jpg?v=1712087785,1,"",false,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,kg,,,true,,,true,,,true,,,active

flair-58-manual-espresso-brewer-black,"Flair 58+ Manual Espresso Brewer, Black","

A SHOT ABOVE OTHER MANUAL ESPRESSO MAKERS

Unlock the true potential of your extraction with the Flair 58 Plus. This model is the flagship from Flair Espresso that has every bell and whistle you could ask for from a magnetic shot mirror, to including both a high-flow and low-flow basket (physical bells and whistles not included).

The Flair 58+ is a fully-manual, professional-grade, lever espresso press that is focused on maximizing the workflow and the espresso from at-home extractions, all in an enhanced package. The Flair 58+ maintains all of the key features of the Flair 58, like an industry standard 58mm portafilter, a more robust frame and lever for ease of extractions at higher pressures, and Flair's Preheat Control System while adding specific aesthetic upgrades.

The Flair 58 Plus includes everything in the base model Flair 58, the Flair 58+ shines with walnut accents on the portafilter, t-grip and palm tamper. The included articulating shot mirror attaches to the post magnetically and the Flair 58+ features custom branding you won’t find anywhere else.

The preheat system on the Flair 58+ includes three different levels: low, medium and high, which roughly correlate to brewing temperatures needed for dark, medium and light roasts respectively. Feeling the travel itch, the 58+ features an easy detachable preheat controller, meaning that you can go off-grid and brew espresso anywhere.
The Flair 58+ also features dark motif screws and includes both of Flair’s portafilter baskets, the high and low-flow, to ensure home baristas have all the control they need.

Flair 58+ base, Flair 58+ lever assembly with brew head, detatchable preheat controller, walnut portafilter with low flow basket, high-flow basket, walnut palm tamper, articulating shot mirror, power box and plug, drip tray, puck screen, manual, post screws and allen key

5 year limited warranty through Flair.

yeti-rambler-8-oz-stackable-cup-agave-teal,"YETI Rambler 8 oz. Stackable Cup, Agave Teal","<meta charset=""utf-8"">

The YETI Rambler® 8 oz. Stackable Cup is designed with the home (or far from home) barista in mind. Start the ascent with an americano, hit the lakeshore with a latte, or conquer your commute with a cortado, it stacks up to how you perk up.

Loaded with all the over-engineered design features you expect from our drinkware - game changing insulation that keeps your coffee hot from the first sip to the last drop, a splash-resistant lid, and unmatched durability-this is a cup built for your daily ritual, however and wherever you take it.
Please note: This magnet slider is not leakproof and will not prevent spills.
