giga-x8c,GIGA X8c,"

The GIGA X8c allows JURA to demonstrate Swiss innovation and professionalism down to the very last detail. The JURA GIGA X8c accommodates a capacity of up to 200 cups optimal for businesses, cafes and offices. The machine impresses users with its quality, functionality and reliability. Coupled with top performance in every respect, this results in a high-tech automatic coffee machine that is ideally tailored to exceed all demand.
The GIGA X8c is the completely new generation of automatic coffee machines for professional use from JURA. It is outstanding in every respect and is more professional in 4 different ways:
• Completely new inner workings of the GIGA X8c mean that is now more robust, efficient, intelligent and even easier to service.
• The dual spout is designed with the needs and requirements of professional users in mind.
• The dishwasher-proof drip tray can easily be removed and cleaned with one hand.
• The touch display is intuitive and simple to operate.

It's all inside the new GIGA X8c: Two high-performance ceramic disc grinders guarantee reliable grinding results for many years which are sure to be precise, consistent and even. A top innovation provides that extra special something: A.G.A.© (Automatic Grinder Adjustment) – the electronically controlled automatic readjustment system. The Pulse Extraction Process (P.E.P.®) ensures the optimum extraction time for short specialties and delivers a more full and bold taste profile for ristretto and espresso.

The GIGA X8c features a sophisticated height-adjustable dual spout, which finishes off-trend specialties with milk and milk foam to perfection thanks to fine foam technology. The speed function ensures specialty coffees in record time.

The maintenance of the new GIGA X8c is just as straightforward and intuitive as its operation. Original JURA maintenance products and integrated rinsing and cleaning programs ensure TÜV-certified hygiene at the touch of a button. The fully automatic milk system cleaning process is started with a touch on the display and ensures perfect cleanliness. The solid dual spout can be dismantled in just a few easy steps. The milk spouts at the front are readily accessible and easy to replace if necessary.

Whether operated as an individual automatic coffee machine or enhanced with suitable accessories such as cup warmers or an accounting system, for example, the GIGA X8c can be used to configure the perfect complete coffee solution for any application. It can also conveniently adapt to increasing requirements.

cup-warmer-s,Cup Warmer S,"
Elevate your coffee experience with prewarmed cups

Baristas always recommend prewarming porcelain cups. That’s because a cold cup can reduce the temperature of freshly prepared coffee by as much as 10 degrees as soon as the beverage hits it. Ensuring that the cup is the right temperature is essential for helping the coffee aroma develop fully.

JURA’s practical, small cup warmer is the ideal partner to any automatic coffee machine. The cup warmer S keeps the cups inside it consistently at a temperature of around 55°C. The cover also prevents heat loss, saving energy as a result.

Measuring just 13.9 x 19.9 x 25.8 cm, the cup warmer S fits in easily wherever it’s placed. All it takes is a switch of the On/Off button to make this simple yet elegant addition to any automatic coffee machine ready to go in no time at all.

The capacity of the cup warmer S is ideally suited to domestic use, providing space for eight espresso cups (diameter 57 mm), six coffee cups (diameter 66 mm) or four cappuccino cups (diameter 90 mm).

The cup warmer S keeps the cups inside it consistently at a temperature of around 55°C. The cover also prevents heat loss, saving energy. With cups prewarmed to the perfect temperature, your speciality coffees will be more aromatic than they’ve ever been – whether they’re a fiery espresso or a creamy cappuccino.

The Giro D'italia special edition of the R58 by Rocket Espresso is the limited edition of only 100 units for the global market. The machines were manufactured for the 100th anniversary of the Giro D'Italia contest, with a circular hand engraving of the tour winners’ names. The pink pressure gauges are also only produced exclusively for the model. In addition to the regular accessories, the unit also includes a ""Giro-Rosa"" stainless steel tamper and the Gazzetta Dello Sport. A real wish for cycling fans! Probably one of the few machines on the market that will make it a real classic.

column2: Flexibility PID: The Rocket R58's have replaced the traditional pressure stat with a PID controller for improved temperature stability. This enables barista's to alter the brewing temperature of their espresso to better suit the characteristics of their chosen blend.

column1:
Passed down from the Legends: Rocket utilizes Faema's revolutionary E61 group head to produce bar quality espresso, in your kitchen.
Plumb in Or Pour Over: Users are able to connect the R58 Giro D'italia directly to their home water supply or use the water reservoir.

column4:
>Double Boiler System: The R58 Giro D'italia is the only Rocket machine that has a true double boiler system. One proprietary boiler holds hot water for coffee and tea while the second proprietary boiler holds steam from frothing.
Dual Professional Gauges: With the addition of the new pressure gauge, barista's are able to monitor pump pressure during extraction.
Insulated Frothing &
column5: Water Wand: Rocket helps create a safe working environment for any barista with their Thermo-Insulated steam wands. These wands will get hot, but not as quickly as traditional un-insulated steam wands.

column4:
>
Cup Warmer: All Rockets have built-in cup warmers located on top of the machine. Having a hot cup is an essential component of brewing perfect espressos.
Rotary Pump: The R58 Giro D'italia comes with a commercial-style rotary pump. The benefits of rotary pumps include ultra-quiet operation and long-lasting durability.
Quality of Service: Faema Canada was the first Canadian company to import Rocket machines back when they were under the ECM label. Our long-standing history and experience with Rocket make us the most qualified retailer of Rocket equipment. Come to any one of our state of the art locations in Ontario and test any model before buying.

column1: Giro D'Italia contests 100th-Anniversary Limited Edition: The circular hand engraving of the tour winners’ names and pink pressure gauges attests to the exclusivity of this model. In addition to the regular accessories, the unit also includes a ""Giro-Rosa"" stainless steel tamper and the Gazzetta Dello Sport. A real wish for cycling fans! Probably one of the few machines on the market that will make it a real classic.

factory-refurbished-e8,Factory Refurbished - E8,"

The new E8 Chrome features an unprecedented amount of innovations, making it the most sleek, advanced, easy-to-use espresso machine in its line. Faema is proud to have this addition to our array of premium super- automatic coffee machines from Jura.
The latest generation of JURA’s most successful coffee machine model boasts a reinterpreted design and a range of benefits previously found only in the premium class.
All refurbished machines are inspected, tested and repaired in house under our 360 point inspection process:
Good as new: All parts with significant wear are replaced including brewing units, grinders and other significant parts in all classes.
360° Inspection: All machines are opened and meticulously cleaned, descaled and tested.
From the source: All work is done in house at the official Jura National Service center of Canada.
Warranty: All machines come with a 1 year parts and labor warranty.
Transparency: All machines come with a diagnostic report printed directly from the information stored on the machine.
Class A: Any machine that falls into class ""A"" will have 1-100 cups produced and minor if any cosmetic scuffs or scratches.
Class B: Any machine that falls into class ""B"" will have 101-1000 cups produced and some minor scuffs or scratches.
Class C: Any machine that falls into class ""C"" will have 1000+ cups produced and likely to have scuffs and scratches.

The Professional Aroma Grinder: The Professional Aroma Grinder guarantees 12.2%* more aroma and consistently high grind quality so that flavours unfold to perfection throughout the entire service life of the grinder. The Pulse Extraction Process (P.E.P.®) ensures maximum flavour for short specialties, while intelligent preheating guarantees the ideal temperature right from the first cup.
Top-Notch Operation: 2.8"" colour display, six buttons and a completely new operating concept featuring artificial intelligence enable simple handling.

Impressive range of products: The E8 can prepare: 1 or Espressos,1 or 2 coffees, Cappuccino, Cappuccino Extra Shot, Caffe Barista, Lungo Barista, Double Espresso, Macchiato, Cortado, Latte Macchiato, Latte Macchiato Extra Shot, Flat White, Flat White Extra Shot, Milk Foam for Hot Chocolate or London Fog and Hot Water for your teas - all in one touch!

Fully Programmable: Program every drink to your liking or make adjustments on the fly with the simple on-screen buttons! Use the intuitive visual programming mode or the expert mode to set your strength and volume and temperature preferences for all drinks.

Smart Mode: Heard of AI (Artificial Intelligence)? You can now experience it first-hand with the NEW E8! We do care a lot about our customers' coffee preferences, so do our machines - the E8 is now able to tell which coffee specialties you enjoy most, how you like them and customize your menu accordingly!

New Fine Foam Frother G2: The new Professional Fine Foam frother G2 included with the E8 creates perfect microfoam at the touch of a button. This new frother is also the easiest to maintain as the cleaning process is now FULLY automatic!

Pulse Extraction Process (P.E.P): A new revolutionary brewing method that extracts espresso in small pulses to guarantee the most authentic flavour and aroma. PEP is the world's first technology of its kind. The slow pulsing extraction process has resulted in the highest quality espresso found on any Super-Automatic espresso machine and is sure to impress even the pickiest espresso aficionado.
Intelligent Water System: The E8 uses RFID technology to ensure the NEW Claris Smart filter is inserted without any programming, making the filter process easier than ever before.
Intelligent Preheating: Like your coffee be as hot as lava? We got you! The New E8 Bypasses the brewing unit with how water before it brews your first and most important cup of morning coffee.
Refined Functionality: The E8 has a front-loading water tank which enables users to disregard height restrictions and valences.
Height Adjustable Dual Spouts: Perfect for small cups or large mugs. The coffee spouts are adjustable from 6.5-11.1 cm and the milk spouts are adjustable from 10.7-15.3 cm!

One-touch milk system cleaning: The sophisticated milk system cleaning process takes place automatically at the touch of a button and is completed in no time. The drip tray also meets the highest ergonomic standards. Its design prevents water from spilling and it can be removed conveniently with just one hand.
Sustainability: All Jura machines use fresh ground beans for every cup creating only compost, no capsules = no waste!
Grinder By-pass: Bypass your Aroma G3 grinder with pre-ground coffee for decaf or other blends!
Separate Hot Water Spout: Unlike its predecessor, the NEW E8 now has a hot water dispenser on the coffee side and there is no need for a rinse.
Filter or Descale: Jura machines enable users to choose between using Claris filters- fresh water in = fresh coffee out, or traditional descaling methods.

The Refined Design: JURA coffee machines feature a clean and expressive characteristic design. High-quality materials and precise craftsmanship underline the premium quality of the modern E8. The styling alone is evidence of its quality, functionality and durability. Details such as the grooved water tank or the high-quality, chrome-plated cup grille perfectly complement the clean, harmonious design of the E8.

giga-x8,GIGA X8,"

It's all inside the new GIGA X8: Two high-performance ceramic disc grinders guarantee reliable grinding results for many years which are sure to be precise, consistent and even. A top innovation provides that extra special something: A.G.A. (Automatic Grinder Adjustment) – the electronically controlled automatic readjustment system. The Pulse Extraction Process (P.E.P.®) optimizes the extraction time for short specialities and CLARIS Pro Smart delivers perfect water quality for a pure taste in combination with the Intelligent Water System (I.W.S.).

The GIGA X8 features a sophisticated height-adjustable dual spout, which finishes off trend specialities with milk and milk foam to perfection thanks to fine foam technology. The speed function ensures speciality coffees in record time.

Increased power combined with the highest quality – that's the new GIGA X8. The concise, 4.3” high-resolution touchscreen colour display is both easy to understand and completely intuitive. The dishwasher-proof drip tray can easily be removed, emptied and reinserted with just one hand. The centre of gravity is ideally located to prevent any spillages. Simple, clean, quick, convenient – this 5-star concept is incorporated down to the very last detail.

The maintenance of the new GIGA X8 is just as straightforward, logical and intuitive as its operation. Original JURA maintenance products and integrated rinsing and cleaning programmes ensure TÜV-certified hygiene at the touch of a button. The milk system is also very easy to clean. The fully automatic process is started with just a touch on the display and ensures perfect cleanliness. The solid dual spout can be dismantled in just a few easy steps. The milk spouts at the front are readily accessible and easy to replace if necessary.

Whether operated as an individual automatic coffee machine or enhanced with suitable accessories such as cup warmers or an accounting system, for example, the GIGA X8 can be used to configure the perfect complete coffee solution for any application. It can also conveniently adapt to increasing requirements.

It's here – the ideal full-size coffee machine for those who want to focus on the essentials: coffee made to perfection.

The E4 is especially suitable for making black coffee specialties. The Professional Aroma Grinder, the eighth-generation brewing unit, and the 3D brewing process all help to create a full-bodied aroma. Always freshly ground, not capsuled. There are three intensity levels to choose from. The intuitive symbol display allows the user to select the required option with just one touch.

The functions also include hot water preparation. As with its features, the E4 is also pared back to the essentials when it comes to design. Crafted with maximum precision, the minimalist lines emphasize its premium quality.

Maximum flavour, minimum complexity. Preselection functions allow the user to define their own personal aroma preferences, so one touch of a button is all it takes to prepare the perfect cup of coffee. It couldn't be easier.

The defining features of the Professional Aroma Grinder include 12.2%* more aroma and consistently high grind quality over its entire service life. Combined with the eighth-generation brewing unit and the 3D brewing process, the result in the cup is truly sublime coffee.
The E4 prepares double products in two cycles.
This results in maximum aroma, because the user can take advantage of the variable brewing unit's full range of 5 to 16 grams of ground coffee for both cups.
If you'd like a cup of tea for a change, no problem. Simply turn the switch to start hot water preparation and up to 300 ml of hot water will flow into the cup in no time at all.
The E4 reflects the characteristic design of JURA coffee machines, with clean lines and surfaces. Crafted with maximum precision, the minimalist lines emphasize the premium quality of the machine.

The use of colours follows the same minimalist approach. While the complete body of the machine is in understated Piano Black, chrome-plated details add accents and set off the finished coffee to perfection.
• 1 x Jura Care kit which includes: Pack of 2 Cleaning tablets, 1 Claris Smart Filter, User manuals, 1 Pre-ground coffee scoop and 1 Funnel
No Milk: If you like milk drinks you might want to consider pairing the E4 with a frother. The E4 does not make any milk-based drinks.

factory-refurbished-s8,Factory Refurbished - S8,"

The S8 is a premium machine in the Jura line and is packed with the latest espresso brewing technologies: P.E.P- Pulse Extraction Process, Aroma G3 Grinder and the Intelligent water system. Features that are now easily accessible through a 4.3"" touch screen. Jura has also improved the functionality of this machine through the design of a new fine foam frother with a directorial automatic cleaning process. The S8 encompasses the finest of features such as a front-loading water tank, a larger bean hopper with a zinc-coated lid to ensure coffee freshness, and adjustable spouts ranging from 7.2-16 cm.

With the integration of the P.E.P brewing process and Aroma G3 grinder, a Super-Automatic espresso has never tasted better. The new brewing unit and grinder combination enhance the aroma, flavour and crema of espresso like never before. This machine is a dream for any tech-savvy individual and adds a touch of modernity to any space.
All refurbished machines are inspected, tested and repaired in house under our 360 point inspection process:
Good as new: All parts with significant wear are replaced including brewing units, grinders and other significant parts in all classes.
360° Inspection: All machines are opened and meticulously cleaned, descaled and tested.
From the source: All work is done in house at the official Jura National Service center of Canada.
Warranty: All machines come with a 1 year parts and labor warranty.
Transparency: All machines come with a diagnostic report printed directly from the information stored on the machine.
Class A: Any machine that falls into class ""A"" will have 1-100 cups produced and minor if any cosmetic scuffs or scratches.
Class B: Any machine that falls into class ""B"" will have 101-1000 cups produced and some minor scuffs or scratches.
Class C: Any machine that falls into class ""C"" will have 1000+ cups produced and likely to have scuffs and scratches.

4.3"" High-Resolution Touch Screen: The S8 offers one of the most intuitive and vivid interfaces thanks to its large 4.3"" touch screen. Simply touch your favourite beverage, and wait for one of Jura's perfectly crafted specialty coffees.

One-Touch Operation: The S8 can prepare: 1 or 2 ristrettos, 1 or 2 espressos, 1 or 2 coffees, cappuccino, caffe latte, espresso macchiato, latte macchiato, flat white, 1 portion milk foam (for hot chocolates), 1 portion steamed milk, hot water and hot water optimized for green tea, all in one touch.

New Professional Fine Foam Frother: The new Professional Fine Foam frother included with the S8 creates perfect micro-foam or steamed milk at the touch of a button. This new frother is also the easiest to maintain as the cleaning process is now automatic
Fully Programmable: Program every drink to your liking or make adjustments on the fly with the intuitive touch screen that walks users through each process.

Pulse Extraction Process (P.E.P): A new revolutionary brewing method that extracts espresso in small pulses to guarantee the most authentic flavour and aroma. The slow pulsing extraction process has resulted in the highest quality espresso found on any Super-Automatic espresso machine and is sure to impress even the pickiest espresso aficionado.
Intelligent Water System: The S8 uses RFID technology to ensure the NEW Claris Smart filter is inserted without any programming, making the filter process easier than ever before.
Refined Functionality: The S8 has a front-loading water tank which enables users to disregard height restrictions and valences.
Sustainability:All Jura machines use fresh ground beans for every cup creating only compost, no capsules = no waste!
Aroma G3 Grinder: The G3 grinder quickly, yet carefully grinds your beans for the perfect extraction.
Grinder By-pass: By-pass your Aroma G3 grinder with pre-ground coffee for decaf or other blends!.
Self-Cleaning: No need to remove the brewing unit or fuss with internal mechanisms as all Jura machines are fully self-cleaning.
Filter or Descale: Jura machines enable users to choose between using Claris filters- fresh water in = fresh coffee out, or traditional descaling methods.
Sleek Modern Design: The use of Chrome and piano black finishes give the S8 a subtle, yet elegant look.

Sharp, clear, reduced forms, elegance, compact design and a clear focus on a unique coffee result are the aspects that set JURA apart. The slimline one-cup machine offers everything that the heart of the coffee purist could desire. It prepares coffee of a quality that otherwise only the best professional baristas would be able to achieve.
All refurbished machines are inspected, tested and repaired in-house under our 360 point inspection process:
Good as new: All parts with significant wear are replaced including brewing units, grinders and other significant parts in all classes.
360° Inspection: All machines are opened and meticulously cleaned, descaled and tested.
From the source: All work is done in house at the official Jura National Service Center of Canada.
Warranty: All machines come with a 1 year parts and labor warranty.
Transparency: All machines come with a diagnostic report printed directly from the information stored on the machine.
Class A: Any machine that falls into class ""A"" will have 1-100 cups produced and minor if any cosmetic scuffs or scratches.
Class B: Any machine that falls into class ""B"" will have 101-1000 cups produced and some minor scuffs or scratches.
Class C: Any machine that falls into class ""C"" will have 1000+ cups produced and likely to have scuffs and scratches.
Efficient Grinder for Fully Preserved Aroma

By perfecting the cutting angle inside the grinding cone, the JURA engineers have managed to increase efficiency significantly. As a result, the perfect aroma can now be achieved in all its natural fullness in half the grinding time. So now coffee lovers can enjoy their favourite coffee beverages with much less preparation time.
Create Your Specialty Coffee in No Time

A minimized operating panel results in maximized enjoyment. Three different cup sizes as well as two coffee strengths can be permanently programmed and selected.. The automatic energy-saving mode with programmable switch-off time and patented Zero-Energy Switch ensure high energy efficiency.

<div>JURA is presenting the ideal one-cup machine for coffee purists and those buying their first coffee machine. It is designed to be as small as possible and will comfortably fit anywhere thanks to its ultra-compact design. It prepares coffees of an enticing quality and, thanks to the Pulse Extraction Process (P.E.P.<sup data-mce-fragment=""1"">®</sup>), it can also produce espresso and ristretto to the same standard. All that is required to start preparing one is to press the state-of-the-art touch panel.

capresso-infinity-plus-grinder,Infinity Plus Grinder,"

Grinding fresh whole bean coffee immediately before brewing is the first step to achieving the best tasting coffee at home. Ground coffee interacts with the air around it and, within hours, loses a great deal of flavour and aroma. The longer the ground coffee is exposed to air the more flavour is lost and the rich, full-bodied taste of the coffee cannot be obtained.

Capresso’s conical burrs are produced as matched pairs and are hand-assembled in Switzerland for a precise fit. Computer-controlled, special grinding heads cut the angles and shapes of the steel burrs to within 0.1 mm precision. The multiple gear motor produces the slowest grinding action (<
column2: 450 rpm) for the highest precision grinding from Turkish fine to percolator coarse

column1: • Commercial-grade, solid steel conical burrs with advanced cutting design for high precision grinding
• Conical burr grinders provide the widest range of precision grinding for every type of brewing method from Turkish, espresso, drip coffee, French press, pour-over brewers and percolators
• 16 clearly marked fineness settings: extra-fine, fine, regular and coarse
• Innovative gear reduction motor creates less friction and heat, preserving maximum flavour and aroma
• Slowest grinding speed in its class creates less friction and heat buildup preserving maximum aroma and flavour for all grind settings
<li>Safety lock system for safe operation during and after use
column2: auto off when bean container is not locked

column1: • Upper conical burr removable for easy cleaning
• Tight-fitting ground coffee container holds up to 4-oz of ground coffee
• See-through bean container holds up to 11-oz of beans
• Cup selector can grind from 1 to 12 cups

capresso-cafe-pro,Café TS - Black,"

Experience the perfect blend of style, functionality, and flavor with the Capresso Café TS in sleek black. This compact espresso machine, measuring just 11¾” x 8 ¾” x 10 ¼”, is designed to fit seamlessly into any kitchen, while its stainless housing and black accents add a touch of elegance.

The Café TS boasts a 15-bar stainless-steel lined Thermo-Block heating system, ensuring each espresso shot is brewed to perfection. Its versatile design allows you to brew from either ground coffee or pods, offering flexibility to suit your coffee preferences.

For those who enjoy lattes and cappuccinos, the machine's integrated steam system froths milk to a creamy consistency. The intuitive, illuminated touchscreen interface makes brewing your favorite coffee beverages a breeze.

The machine features a 50-ounce removable water tank for easy refilling and cleaning. With an auto-shut off feature, the Capresso Café TS prioritizes energy efficiency, automatically turning off to conserve power.

Each machine comes with a coffee scoop/tamper and is backed by a one-year limited warranty for peace of mind. Experience the luxury of café-quality espresso from the comfort of your home with the Capresso Café TS.
• For perfectly brewed espresso, plus steam for lattes and cappuccinos
• Compact design, with stainless housing and black accents

Add a touch of indulgence to your morning coffee with the SCHIUMA Milk Frother. This handheld, battery-operated milk frother whips up cold milk in seconds, transforming your daily cup of joe into a coffeehouse specialty – all from the comfort of your home.

Featuring a lightweight, ergonomic design that fits neatly into the palm of your hand, the SCHIUMA Milk Frother works like magic. With the push of a button, you’ll create light, airy foam for your cappuccino, latte, mocha or even an indulgent hot chocolate.

And when coffee hour is over, this nifty little gadget can be used to mix up milkshakes, salad dressings, protein drinks or cocktails, making it an indispensable and versatile addition to your kitchen.
• Handheld, battery-operated milk frother that creates café-style drinks at the push of a button
• Lightweight design with flexible steel wand and ergonomic plastic handle
• Single power button for easy, one-handed operation
• Whips up light, airy foam in seconds
• Easy to clean – simply rinse the steel wand after use
• Available in a choice of colors and finishes
• Before use, insert 2 AA batteries and lock the lid into place.
• Fill a glass beaker with between 2 and 4 oz of milk – it’s best to use cold, low-fat milk, though you can use warm or full-fat milk or non-dairy options if you prefer.

• Insert the SCHIUMA Milk Frother so the tip of the wand is close to the bottom of the beaker. Switch on the power button and slowly move the frother up and down until the milk has doubled in volume (about 25 to 30 seconds).
• If you wish, you can heat the frothed milk for 30 seconds in the microwave before use.
• Rinse the wand in hot water and wipe dry.

BODUM’s Pour Over coffee maker is the key to making richer, bolder coffee from the comfort of your home. Its design-led aesthetic is a stylish addition to any kitchen, but it’s the resulting full-bodied, smooth tasting coffee with a robust aroma that will win your heart.

Made from premium quality borosilicate glass that doesn’t absorb taste or aroma, the beautifully shaped carafe is fitted with a permanent stainless steel filter for truly sustainable brewing. No wasteful paper filters that trap essential oils and flavor

Pour over brewing encourages a more mindful start to your day. This innovative, fuss-free filter coffee maker is simple to use and gives you ultimate control over your cup of joe. All you need is filter coffee grounds, hot water, four minutes of your day and a little Bodum magic – and you have all the ingredients for a delicious brew. This is pour over, perfected.
• Innovative pour over coffee maker that makes barista-quality coffee at home.
• Made from premium borosilicate glass that’s non-porous and doesn’t absorb taste or aroma.
• Permanent stainless steel filter that produces a rich taste and robust aroma.
• Environmentally friendly brewing method – no paper filters or plastic capsules.
• Easy to use and easy to clean.
How to brew delicious coffee with the filter coffee maker pour over:
• Place your pour over on a flat, heatproof, non-slip surface.
• Add fresh, filter ground coffee to the cone – we recommend one rounded teaspoon or one Bodum scoop for each cup/4oz water.
• Slowly pour hot (not boiling) water in a circular motion over the coffee grounds, until they’re evenly saturated. Then pour additional hot water up to maximum capacity.
• Allow water to pass through the coffee into the borosilicate glass carafe (this takes around four minutes).
• Remove the filter, insert the plastic lid, and pour a great cup of joe.
Wash in warm, soapy water before first use and dry thoroughly. The glass carafe and stainless steel filter are dishwasher safe.

rocket-espresso-cups,Espresso Cups - Hashtag Series - Set of 6,"

The comfortable design of a Rocket Espresso cup is easy to hold and strong enough for restaurant applications. This set of six espresso cups is perfect to add a special touch of elegance to your table.

rocket-cappuccino-cups,Cappuccino Cups - Hashtag Series - Set of 6,"

The comfortable design of a Rocket Cappuccino cup is easy to hold and strong enough for restaurant applications. This set of six cups is perfect to add a special touch of elegance to your table.

rocket-flat-white-cups,Flat White Cups - Hashtag Series - Set of 6,"

The comfortable design of a Rocket Flat White cup is easy to hold and strong enough for restaurant applications. This set of six cups is perfect to add a special touch of elegance to your table.
(6) Rocket Flat White Cups and Saucers
10″ X 6″ Blender Container Rinser (C662)
Clean coffee equipment with this handy rinser. Easy to set-up blender container rinser for busy cafes. Connect water and drain line pipes.
Best hygienic option. Powerful sprayjet gives good quick wash in seconds. Made of stainless steel.All Krome rinsers are NSF certified.
Please Note: It is recommended that you use a Pressure Limiting Valve (PLV) when connecting to a mains water line.

capresso-froth-ts,Froth TS,"

Enjoy decadent hot chocolate any way you want it with the froth TS. This easy-to-use countertop appliance creates rich, frothy hot cocoa using chocolate chips, syrup or powder – made with dairy or non-dairy milk. Capresso’s special hot chocolate function allows the user to add chocolate chips directly into the pitcher.

It can also prepare café quality frothed milk for rich cappuccinos, lattes and more. Convenience features include simple one-touch operation with illuminated control and a removeable nonstick coated aluminum milk pitcher with stay-cool handle that is dishwasher safe on the top rack.
The froth TS comes with two frothing disks and one heating disk that store securely in the bottom of the base, so they don’t get lost.
• 3 settings: cold froth, hot froth, hot chocolate
• Exclusive hot chocolate function prepares the best hot chocolate using chocolate chips
• Simple one-touch operation with illuminated control
• Removeable non-stick coated aluminum milk pitcher with stay-cool handle is dishwasher safe (top-rack only)
• Patented frothing technology delivers maximum milk froth at the touch of a button
• Two frothing disks and one heating disk
• Disks store securely in bottom of base

jura-e6-superautomatic-coffee-machine-1,E6,"

Cappuccino with a master touch: Treat yourself to perfect coffee every day with the E6. In addition to classic black coffee specialties, it makes the crowd favorite, the cappuccino, to perfection thanks to the Easy Cappuccino function.

The Professional Aroma Grinder, by virtue of its more consistent grinding result, ensures that you get more aromatic coffee, while the sophisticated operating concept with color display and buttons means coffee preparation is boiled down to the basics at the touch of a button thanks to simple, straightforward user guidance. Its timeless, elegant design makes the E6 an eye-catching feature in every kitchen.

column2: >Even more aroma for even more enjoyment

column1: The Professional Aroma Grinder gives you unique coffee enjoyment. Thanks to perfected grinder geometry, the grinder achieves an even more uniform quality of the regrind, reliably and unchanged over its entire service life. This optimizes aroma extraction and achieves an increase in aroma of 12.2% compared to conventional grinders. Discover completely new facets of your favorite coffee specialty.

With the proven Easy Cappuccino function, you can enjoy a wonderful cappuccino at the push of a button. The milk nozzle specially developed for cappuccino ensures uniquely soft, fine-pored milk foam that perfectly complements the coffee and promises true enjoyment. The ultimate for cappuccino lovers.

The clear 2.8"" color display, six ideally placed buttons, and an intuitive operating concept enable the E6 to be operated comfortably for simple coffee preparation as well as for setting individual preferences or self-explanatory cleaning functions. Of course, the E6 is also compatible with J.O.E.®: Prepare coffee specialties from your smartphone, set your personal preferences and save them or send several coffee orders from your guests directly to the fully automatic coffee specialty machine.

With calm elegance, the design of the E6 reflects the unique technology that is hidden behind its timeless façade. The straightforward geometry with elegantly chrome-plated accents ensures a clear expression that uncompromisingly focuses on first-class coffee and blends harmoniously into any equipment. In terms of both specialty selection and design, the E6 deliberately dispenses with any excess that could distract from its true core: the perfect cup of coffee.
Espresso, 2 × Espresso, Coffee, 2 × Coffee, Caffè Barista, Lungo Barista, Espresso Macchiato, Cappuccino, Cappuccino Extra Shot, Portion of milk foam, Hot water

faema-paper-coffee-cups,Faema Paper Coffee Cups,"

These 100% recyclable paper cups are perfect for take out, the office, or entertaining. 10 oz, 12 oz, and 16 oz sizes have double wall insulation which eliminates the need for sleeves, and reduces the risk of burns.
All refurbished machines are inspected, tested and repaired in house under our 360 point inspection process:
Good as new: All parts with significant wear are replaced including brewing units, grinders and other significant parts in all classes.
360° Inspection: All machines are opened and meticulously cleaned, descaled and tested.
From the source: All work is done in house at the official Jura National Service center of Canada.
Warranty: All machines come with a 1 year parts and labor warranty.
Transparency: All machines come with a diagnostic report printed directly from the information stored on the machine.
Class A: Any machine that falls into class ""A"" will have 1-100 cups produced and minor if any cosmetic scuffs or scratches.
Class B: Any machine that falls into class ""B"" will have 101-1000 cups produced and some minor scuffs or scratches.
Class C: Any machine that falls into class ""C"" will have 1000+ cups produced and likely to have scuffs and scratches.

The all-new ENA 8 series is sure to impress with its compact size, Color TFT display, and award-winning design. This compact machine is packed with the latest Jura technology including RFID Claris smart filtration system, Pulse Extraction Process, wide selection of drinks and so much more.

The ENA 8 has over 10 specialty coffees that can be prepared at the touch of a single button, including cappuccino, latte macchiato, flat white etc. If counter space is a concern for you - ENA 8 is exactly what you are looking for.

NEW Pulse Extraction Process (P.E.P):A new revolutionary brewing method that extracts espresso in short pulses to guarantee the most authentic flavour and aroma. PEP is a world-first for the super-automatic segment.
TFT Color Display: The TFT colour display makes using this machine very intuitive as it guides you through every process with simple graphics.
One-Touch Operation:The Ena 8 can make the full range of specialty coffees, in one touch: Latte Macchiato, Cappuccino, Cafe Creme, Espresso, Americano, milk foam (for hot chocolate) &

Fully Programmable:Program every drink to your liking or make adjustments on the fly! Use the intuitive visual programming mode or the expert mode to set your strength and volume preferences for all drinks.
Dedicated Hot Water Spout:This is becoming rare on super-automatic machines and is a tea-lovers dream.
Revolutionary Fine Foam Technology: The built-in frother produces rich, creamy milk foam at the touch of a button. Try it with almond milk!
Small Footprint:The Ena 8 has a small footprint and can fit in almost any space at 27.1 cm X 32.3 cm X 44.5 cm (WxHxD).
Height Adjustable spout:Perfect for small espresso cups or large mugs. The spouts can go as low as 5.5 cm and as high as 13.8 cm!
Sustainability:All Jura machines use fresh ground beans for every cup creating only compost, no capsules = no waste!
NEW Multi-level Aroma G3 Grinder:The G3 grinder quickly, yet carefully grinds your beans for the perfect extraction.
Grinder By-pass: By-pass your grinder with pre-ground coffee for decaf or other blends!.
Self-Cleaning: No need to remove the brewing unit or fuss with internal mechanisms as all Jura machines are fully self-cleaning.
Filter or Descale:Jura machines enable users to choose between using Claris filters- fresh water in = fresh coffee out, or traditional descaling methods.
Sleek Modern Design: The hard lines and bold colour combination are sure to make a statement in any environment.

automatic-dough-rounder,Automatic Dough Rounder,"The Euro-Milan Automatic Bun Rounding Divider is a hydraulic machine designed to streamline the process of bun production in bakeries and food service establishments. It is equipped with two cylinders for pressing, one for cutting, and one for rounding, ensuring a smooth and efficient operation.

This machine features a control panel that allows users to adjust the pressing, rounding, and shaping chamber opening times. It also includes a knife cleaning button for easy maintenance. One of the standout features of this machine is its ability to store up to 9 different programs, allowing for a diverse range of bun production.

The Euro-Milan Automatic Bun Rounding Divider has a weight of 245 Kg and packing dimensions of 760 x 1670 x 730 mm. It offers different divisions weight options ranging from 12 to 180 grams, with a maximum basin capacity of 5.5 kg. The machine's hourly capacity varies depending on the division weight, with a maximum of 6200 pieces per hour for the 12-gram division.

The work cycle of the machine is straightforward. It involves manually inserting the plate, closing the front guard, setting the operating times, pressing the Start button, and the machine then presses, cuts, and rounds automatically. After the process, the front guard is opened, and the plate with the shaped buns is removed.

The Euro-Milan Automatic Bun Rounding Divider is a reliable and efficient solution for high-volume bun production, ensuring consistent quality and reducing manual labor. It is a valuable addition to any bakery or food service establishment looking to optimize their bun production process.
• Hydraulic machine with two cylinders for pressing, one for cutting, and one for rounding.
• Control panel for adjusting pressing, rounding, and shaping chamber opening times.
• Ability to store up to 9 different programs for diverse bun production.
• Various divisions weight options ranging from 12 to 180 grams.
• Hourly capacity varies depending on the division weight, with a maximum of 6200 pieces per hour for the 12-gram division.
• Automated work cycle for efficient and consistent bun production.

jura-giga-10-superautomatic-coffee-machine,GIGA 10,"<div data-sr-id=""2"" data-animate=""basic"" class=""mod_pagetitle page-inner load-hidden"" data-init=""pagetitle"">
The GIGA 10 advanced automatic coffee machine redefines the expectations of coffee drinkers, with superior performance standards.

With two bean containers, each with its own grinder, the revolutionary cold extraction process, an innovative panorama panel for ease of use and an intuitive new operating concept, the GIGA 10 offers a wider choice of speciality beverages than ever before. It is presented in a stunning design that impressively emphasises the power of this unique machine.
The GIGA 10 recreates the experience of barista-crafted coffee at home, transforming your kitchen into a coffee bar with just the touch of a button.

column2: id=""pagelayout_0_pagetype_0_pagecontent_0_tabcontent_0_repTabContentBlock_conContentBlock_0_genTitle_0"" class=""title"">More choice, more options for customization
>

>With a total of 35 speciality coffees, the GIGA 10 offers the widest choice of any JURA coffee machine. You can also adjust the GIGA 10 to suit your personal preferences, because the innovative user interface provides virtually unlimited options for customisation. For example, why not enjoy your flat white with an extra shot of intensely flavoured coffee?

>The range of beverages is doubled by the revolutionary cold extraction process, which gives you the option of preparing any speciality as a cold brew version. And finally, the new cold water bypass enables you to create long barista specialities. Be your own barista and enjoy an authentic coffee bar experience at home!
id=""pagelayout_0_pagetype_0_pagecontent_0_tabcontent_0_repTabContentBlock_conContentBlock_1_genTitle_1"" class=""title"">Two ceramic disc grinders for added deliciousness
>For maximum professionalism, the GIGA 10 features not just one but two high-performance grinders made of a long-lasting, high-quality ceramic material.

>Two bean containers with an elegant turbine look are each connected to a separate grinder, allowing you to choose the ideal type of coffee or the optimum blend for every cup. For example, you might choose a more intense, dark roasting to make an aromatic espresso and a medium roasting for a mild lungo or coffee with milk.
id=""pagelayout_0_pagetype_0_pagecontent_0_tabcontent_0_repTabContentBlock_conContentBlock_2_genTitle_2"" class=""title"">Panorama Coffee Panel for a whole new user experience

column1: For maximum clarity and even more intuitive operation, the GIGA 10 comes with a new touch-operated panel in wide panoramic format. The new panorama panel allows you to see everything at a glance.

Navigate intuitively through the wide range of settings in the new user interface. Simply tap and slide to customize and prepare your favorite beverage – with the GIGA 10, the size, intensity, and ratio of coffee to milk and milk foam can all be easily adjusted.

The sheer power and performance of the GIGA 10 are perfectly expressed by its imposing design. The front panel in elegant Diamond Black with chrome elements and the impressive Panorama Coffee Panel make a quiet but unmistakable statement.

The two bean containers with their turbine design are reminiscent of the powerful engine of a sports car, evoking a sense of luxury and performance. The redesigned cup grille completes the harmonious look.
The GIGA 10 embodies eye-catching design and pure prestige, presenting truly exceptional coffee to perfection.

jura-j8-superautomatic-coffee-machine,J8,"

Experience the epitome of luxury coffee with the Jura J8, a state-of-the-art automatic coffee machine that combines Swiss precision with a sleek, modern design. This machine is a testament to Jura's commitment to quality, sustainability, and intuitive operation, offering a range of coffee specialties at the touch of a button. The Jura J8 is not just a coffee machine
column2: it's a statement of exquisite taste and a testament to the love of coffee.
>Introducing Sweet Foam Function: Elevate Your Indulgence

column3:
>
Discover a whole new world of indulgence with the revolutionary Sweet Foam function. Just like top chefs, we believe in the power of pure, fresh ingredients expertly prepared. This function takes specialty coffees to the next level by infusing the milk foam with delightful flavors using the syrup attachment.

column1: Customize the flavor and intensity to suit your personal preferences by selecting the syrup type and amount. With the J8's Sweet Foam function, you can effortlessly create popular trend specialties like the Sweet Latte with a simple touch of a button.

column2: >Coffee Eye: The Smart Cup Sensor for Perfection

column3:
>
Preparing the perfect cup of coffee is now easier than ever, thanks to the Coffee Eye. Whether you prefer a classic coffee from the central spout or a specialty with milk and milk foam from the cappuccino spout, this smart cup sensor has got you covered. By detecting the position of your cup, it automatically adjusts the displayed selection of specialties, making the process even more intuitive and hassle-free.

column2: >P.A.G.2+: Cutting-Edge Technology for Ultimate Coffee Experience

column3:
>
Experience the ultimate coffee enjoyment with the P.A.G.2+ grinder, a true masterpiece inspired by Formula 1 technology. This exceptional grinder boasts unparalleled design and performance. Its aroma control function actively monitors the grind consistency, guaranteeing perfect results every time.

>
Immerse yourself in the harmonious design of the J8, a true embodiment of clarity and symmetry. Its superior manufacturing standards and precision craftsmanship reflect the expertise and passion that went into its creation. The award-winning design has been reinterpreted with meticulous attention to detail, showcasing the machine's exceptional quality.

jura-ena-8,ENA 8,"

Introducing the ENA 8, a state-of-the-art coffee machine designed to bring the coffee shop experience right into your home. With its cutting-edge technology and user-friendly interface, the ENA 8 offers a range of coffee specialties that are sure to delight your senses.

column2: >Premium Technology for an Unbeatable Coffee Experience

column1: When it comes to technology, the ENA 8 is nothing short of premium. The Professional Aroma Grinder ensures that your coffee grounds are evenly textured, enhancing the aroma by an impressive 12.2%.

column2: the machine's innovative fine foam technology creates light, airy milk foam that takes your milk-based coffee specialties to the next level. And if you're in the mood for black coffee, the two-cup function allows you to prepare two servings simultaneously. With TÜV-certified hygiene guaranteed by the machine's ingenious milk system cleaning function, you can rest assured that your coffee will always be perfect.

column1: The ENA 8 offers a user-friendly experience that makes coffee-making a breeze. The intuitive touchscreen display gives you access to 15 different coffee specialties, all at the touch of a button. And speaking of hygiene, the milk system cleaning function is also easily activated, ensuring TÜV-certified cleanliness.
What's more, the machine is WiFi-enabled and compatible with J.O.E.®, allowing you to operate it conveniently from your smartphone.
Don't let its small size fool you
column2: the ENA 8 packs a punch. Measuring just 27.1 x 32.3 x 44.5 cm, this compact machine fits almost anywhere without compromising on performance or quality.

column1: The minimalist design features clean lines and high-quality materials, complemented by elegant accents like a chrome-plated cup tray and a crystal-clear, diamond-look water tank. It's the perfect choice for those who appreciate both aesthetics and a great cup of coffee.

Overview: Indulge in the rich aroma and full-bodied flavor of the Espresso Speaks Italian. This exquisite coffee blend combines the fragrant notes of Arabica with the robust taste of chocolate-infused Robusta, offering a perfect balance for an invigorating espresso experience.
Top Notes: Fragrant Arabica, Chocolate Infusion

Blend: The Espresso Speaks Italian is a harmonious blend of high-quality Arabica and Robusta beans. The Arabica beans contribute a fragrant aroma and a smooth finish, while the Robusta beans add a robust body and a hint of chocolate, creating a well-rounded flavor profile.

Packaging: The coffee comes in a stylish, airtight tin that preserves its freshness and flavor. The 250g size is perfect for enjoying multiple cups of rich, flavorful espresso without the worry of the coffee losing its character.
Enjoy the Italian Espresso Experience: Espresso Speaks Italian is not just a coffee
column2:
it's an experience. It transports you to the quaint cafes of Italy, where coffee is a passion and an art. Enjoy the authentic Italian espresso experience right in the comfort of your home with Espresso Speaks Italian.

The GIGA 10 advanced automatic coffee machine redefines the expectations of coffee drinkers, with superior performance standards.

With two bean containers, each with its own grinder, the revolutionary cold extraction process, an innovative panorama panel for ease of use and an intuitive new operating concept, the GIGA 10 offers a wider choice of speciality beverages than ever before. It is presented in a stunning design that impressively emphasises the power of this unique machine.
The GIGA 10 recreates the experience of barista-crafted coffee at home, transforming your kitchen into a coffee bar with just the touch of a button.

column2: >With a total of 35 speciality coffees, the GIGA 10 offers the widest choice of any JURA coffee machine. You can also adjust the GIGA 10 to suit your personal preferences, because the innovative user interface provides virtually unlimited options for customisation. For example, why not enjoy your flat white with an extra shot of intensely flavoured coffee?

>The range of beverages is doubled by the revolutionary cold extraction process, which gives you the option of preparing any speciality as a cold brew version. And finally, the new cold water bypass enables you to create long barista specialities. Be your own barista and enjoy an authentic coffee bar experience at home!
>Two ceramic disc grinders for added deliciousness
>
>For maximum professionalism, the GIGA 10 features not just one but two high-performance grinders made of a long-lasting, high-quality ceramic material.

>Two bean containers with an elegant turbine look are each connected to a separate grinder, allowing you to choose the ideal type of coffee or the optimum blend for every cup. For example, you might choose a more intense, dark roasting to make an aromatic espresso and a medium roasting for a mild lungo or coffee with milk.
>Panorama Coffee Panel for a whole new user experience

column1: For maximum clarity and even more intuitive operation, the GIGA 10 comes with a new touch-operated panel in wide panoramic format. The new panorama panel allows you to see everything at a glance.

Navigate intuitively through the wide range of settings in the new user interface. Simply tap and slide to customize and prepare your favorite beverage – with the GIGA 10, the size, intensity, and ratio of coffee to milk and milk foam can all be easily adjusted.

The sheer power and performance of the GIGA 10 are perfectly expressed by its imposing design. The front panel in elegant Diamond Black with chrome elements and the impressive Panorama Coffee Panel make a quiet but unmistakable statement.

The two bean containers with their turbine design are reminiscent of the powerful engine of a sports car, evoking a sense of luxury and performance. The redesigned cup grille completes the harmonious look.
The GIGA 10 embodies eye-catching design and pure prestige, presenting truly exceptional coffee to perfection.

fabbri-panettone,Panettone,"

In 1795 , Maestro Tommaso Muzzi opened a small pastry shop in the heart of Foligno , a town in central Umbria . Today, Muzzi continues to make the highest quality Italian pastries, cookies, and cakes .

This panettone, which translates to “big bread,” is a sweet, dome -shaped loaf studded with wild Amarena cherries from Fabbri . Excellent on its own, panettone pairs well with fresh berries, whipped cream, and dark chocolate .

Wheat flour, candied cherries 22 % (black cherries, sugar, glucose syrup, water, acids : citric acid, black cherry juice concentrate, natural coloring : anthocyanins, flavorings), butter, eggs, sugar, egg yolk, milk, natural yeast (wheat), emulsifiers : mono and diglycerides of fatty acids, flavorings, cocoa butter, salt . May contain nuts and soy.

A true Italian holiday favorite, pandoro is a traditional sweet golden bread most popular from Veneto region of Italy .

The cake is baked in an eight -pointed star - shaped pan that gives it its signature form, modeled after the mountains near Verona, where the cake was first made. Amarena Fabbri Pandoro is a modern twist of this unique tradition.

Wheat flour, fresh eggs, sugar, butter, black candied cherries 11.5 % (black cherries, sugar, glucose syrup, water, acidifier : citric acid, concentrated black cherry juice, natural colors : anthocyanins, flavorings), milk, sourdough natural (wheat), emulsifier : mono and diglycerides fatty acids, flavors, cocoa butter, salt . Ingredient of the bag of powdered sugar : sugar, wheat starch, flavours. May contain nuts and soy.

la-pizza-romana-cooking-class,La Pizza Romana Cooking Class,"<!-- Metadata for SEO --> <meta name=""description"" content=""Join our exclusive Pizza Romana Impala cooking class with Master Pizzaiolo, Pasquale Ponticiello, and learn to create authentic Italian pizza at home.""> <meta name=""keywords"" content=""Pizza Cooking Class, Italian Cooking, Culinary Workshop, Faema Culinary Academy, Pizza Making""> <meta name=""author"" content=""Faema Canada""> <link rel=""stylesheet"" type=""text/css"" href=""styles.css"">

<!-- Metadata for SEO --> <meta name=""description"" content=""Join our exclusive Pizza Romana Impala cooking class with Master Pizzaiolo, Pasquale Ponticiello, and learn to create authentic Italian pizza at home.""> <meta name=""keywords"" content=""Pizza Cooking Class, Italian Cooking, Culinary Workshop, Faema Culinary Academy, Pizza Making""> <meta name=""author"" content=""Faema Canada"">
Location: Faema Culinary Academy, 672 Dupont Street, Toronto, ON, M6G 1Z5, Canada

Embark on a culinary journey with our La Pizza Romana Cooking Class. Master the art of traditional Italian pizza making with expert guidance from our renowned Master Pizzaiolo, Pasquale Ponticiello. This interactive, hands-on class will teach you the essential skills to prepare, knead, stretch, and store dough, create a savory tomato sauce, and craft the perfect Pizza della Nonna.

Enjoy a delightful evening starting with a charcuterie board and wine, followed by an engaging theoretical and practical session. You'll learn about the history of pizza, dough preparation techniques, and get to prepare your specialty pizza.
• 6:50 PM - Specialty Pizza Preparation by Chefs
• 7:20 PM - Dough Rounding, Shaping, and Stretching Techniques
• 7:45 PM - Personal Pizza Creation and Baking
At the end of the class, enjoy sharing and eating your pizza creations. Guests will also have the opportunity to bring home the dough they prepared.
Spaces are limited, so secure your spot today!
No refunds after purchase. Dietary restrictions should be communicated at booking. Exchanges allowed up to 5 days prior to event. Class requires a minimum of 8 guests.

fabbri-mixybar-hazelnut-j15-pet-1l,Mixybar Hazelnut - 1l,"

Golden yellow with amber highlights, it takes on straw yellow hues when diluted. Its aroma features intense and persistent toasted notes of Piedmont hazelnut and hints of walnut and dried fruit. Smooth and enveloping, intense and well balanced on the palate, with a lingering toasted aftertaste. A natural combination with coffee, iced tea and milk and the key ingredient in the Hazelnut Ice Mocha recipe.
Popular categories: hot and cold coffee.

Indulge in the rich and nutty taste of Mixybar Sugar-free Hazelnut. This exquisite hazelnut syrup brings a guilt-free indulgence to your favorite beverages. Perfect for those who love the flavor of hazelnuts without the added sweetness, this syrup is an essential addition to any drink enthusiast's collection.

Simply add a dash of Mixybar Sugar-free Hazelnut to your beverages. Stir thoroughly to blend in the flavors. Experiment with a variety of recipes, from coffee to cocktails, and enjoy the full-bodied hazelnut taste in every drink, guilt-free.
All refurbished machines are inspected, tested and repaired in house under our 360 point inspection process:
Good as new: All parts with significant wear are replaced including brewing units, grinders and other significant parts in all classes.
360° Inspection: All machines are opened and meticulously cleaned, descaled and tested.
From the source: All work is done in house at the official Jura National Service center of Canada.
Warranty: All machines come with a 1 year parts and labor warranty.
Transparency: All machines come with a diagnostic report printed directly from the information stored on the machine.
Class A: Any machine that falls into class ""A"" will have 1-100 cups produced and minor if any cosmetic scuffs or scratches.
Class B: Any machine that falls into class ""B"" will have 101-1000 cups produced and some minor scuffs or scratches.
Class C: Any machine that falls into class ""C"" will have 1000+ cups produced and likely to have scuffs and scratches.
The First One-Cup Machine in the World with P.E.P.®

As a modern one-cup machine of the latest generation, the ENA Micro 90 dazzles with a wide range of specialty coffees, unique coffee quality, intuitive operation, compact dimensions and perfect hygiene. The Pulse Extraction Process (P.E.P.®) optimizes the extraction time and guarantees maximum aroma with short specialties like espresso.
The first one-cup machine in the world with P.E.P.®

JURA has perfected the complete brewing process for short specialty coffees from 15 ml to 80 ml. That’s why the ENA Micro 90 prepares them to the same standard you would expect in a coffee bar. The AromaG3 grinder, now twice as fast, ensures that the coffee is optimally ground to preserve the full aroma.

The ENA Micro 90 can do much more than ‘just’ make the perfect coffee: thanks to the One-Touch technology, it also creates trend specialties like latte macchiato and cappuccino at the touch of a button with milk and milk foam. It can also prepare a portion of milk foam with equal ease.

The clearly laid out operating module exudes the elegance of simplicity with its subtle, slotted buttons. All settings and programme functions can be selected by simply turning and pressing the Rotary Switch.

The ENA Micro 90 packs dazzling functionality into its compact dimensions. It will fit into a small space while cutting an elegant figure with its relaxed, clean lines. The way it leans towards the user expresses expertise, while the colours convey perfect harmony.

Containing premium technology that is usually found exclusively in full-sized commercial espresso machines, the Rocket Mozzafiato Type R brings the power and performance of a commercial machine to your home.

Increased Temperature Stability: The new adjustable PID temperature control system, insulated 1.80-litre boiler, and 9mm boiler end plates, delivers enhanced temperature stability for brewing the perfect espresso at your desired temperature.
Commercial Grade Rotary Pump: Ensures quiet yet robust extraction while brewing espresso
Reservoir or Direct Connection Option: Provides the user with the option of drawing water from either the removable 2.9-litre water reservoir or connecting the machine directly to a water supply.
Heat Exchanger Boiler Design: Ensures hot water and steam are always readily available thereby eliminating any wait time between brewing espresso and frothing milk.
Stainless Steel Body: The Mozzafiato's body, drip tray, cup warmer frame, and adjustable feet are completely made of rust-resistant stainless steel.
Cup Warmer: Maintains the warmth of your hot beverages by minimizing heat loss caused by the use of cool or room temperature cups.
Dual Professional Gauges: Provides readings of both the boiler and pump pressure levels.
Insulated Frothing Wands: Although the frothing wand will get hot over time, the insulated frothing wand keeps cooler for a greater amount of time compared to traditional un-insulated wands.
• (1) USB drive containing in-depth information and instructions on the Mozzafiato Evoluzione Type R

capresso-coffeeteam-ts,CoffeeTEAM TS,"

The CoffeeTEAM TS uses the same solid steel conical burrs as found in high-end automatic coffee machines. The slow grinding of the burrs imparts minimal heat, preserving more aroma than blade grinding as well as allowing for a finer, more uniform grind.

The CoffeeTEAM TS lets you program the amount of coffee you want to grind: choose from 2, 4, 6, 8 or 10 cups and select mild, regular or strong. The coffee filter holder stays inside the machine during grinding, preserving more aromas and reducing mechanical movements. The stainless steel thermal carafe keeps the coffee hot and fresh for hours.
• Freshly grinds whole coffee beans directly into the filter then automatically brews up to 10-cups of coffee
• 10-cup stainless steel thermal carafe keeps coffee perfectly hot for hours, without reheating
• Permanent GoldTone Filter is easy to use and clean
• 24-hour programmable clock/timer with easy-to-read LCD display shows time, grind and strength settings
• Large 6-ounce bean container holds enough beans for 20 cups of brewed coffee before refilling
• Five fineness settings for light to dark beans let you adjust the grinder to your preferred taste (the darker/oilier the bean, the coarser the setting)
• Direct-feed technology accommodates a more compact design and keeps moisture away from the grinder
• Detachable see-through cover lets you check the flow of the ground coffee and makes it extremely easy to clean the grinder channel

column2: temperature in pot after brewing is 180°F

column1: • Charcoal water filter removes up to 82% of chlorine and other impurities
• Drip stop for pouring a cup while brewing

The CoffeeTEAM TS uses the same solid steel conical burrs as found in high-end automatic coffee machines. The slow grinding of the burrs imparts minimal heat, preserving more aroma than blade grinding as well as allowing for a finer, more uniform grind. The CoffeeTEAM TS lets you program the amount of coffee you want to grind: choose from 2, 4, 6, 8 or 10 cups and select mild, regular or strong. The coffee filter holder stays inside the machine during grinding, preserving more aromas and reducing mechanical movements. The stainless steel thermal carafe keeps the coffee hot and fresh for hours.
Freshly grinds whole coffee beans directly into the filter then automatically brews up to 10-cups of coffee
10-cup stainless steel thermal carafe keeps coffee perfectly hot for hours, without reheating
Permanent GoldTone Filter is easy to use and clean
24-hour programmable clock/timer with easy-to-read LCD display shows time, grind and strength settings
A large 6-ounce bean container holds enough beans for 20 cups of brewed coffee before refilling
Five fineness settings for light to dark beans let you adjust the grinder to your preferred taste (the darker/oilier the bean, the coarser the setting)
Direct-feed technology accommodates a more compact design and keeps moisture away from the grinder
Detachable see-through cover lets you check the flow of the ground coffee and makes it extremely easy to clean the grinder channel

trucillo-espresso-speaks-italian-gift-pack,Espresso Speaks Italian Gift Pack,"

Includes: 250g. Tin Ground Coffee and 2 Cups &

The Espresso Speaks Italian “barattolo” has a Blend of precious and refined qualities of Arabica and Robusta. The perfumed Arabica coffee combined with the full-bodied taste of chocolaty Robusta gives a fine aroma and a soft, velvety pleasure.

Its taste is rich, lively and balanced. The one-way value at the bottom is a unique feature that allows C02 naturally released by coffee to exit the tin but doesn’t allow oxygen to get in (which would oxidize the coffee faster).

The presence of the one-way valve allows coffee to be packed fresh as soon as its grinded hence preserving all of the aromas

ancap-palermo-white-thick-espresso-cups,Palermo White Thick Espresso Cups,"

Ancap Palermo White Thick Espresso Cups - Set of 6

Experience unparalleled elegance and functionality with the Ancap Palermo White Thick Espresso Cups set of 6. These premium espresso cups are designed to meet the exacting standards of professional baristas and coffee enthusiasts alike, featuring an ergonomically designed egg-shaped bottom for flawless pouring and a high-quality porcelain body for exceptional thermal insulation and strength.

Crafted from the finest materials, each espresso cup is a testament to Ancap's commitment to excellence. Utilizing a select blend of Kaolin, Feldspar, and Quartz, Ancap ensures that every piece of porcelain is not only aesthetically pleasing but also free from harmful heavy metals like lead and cadmium, guaranteeing safety and peace of mind.

Ancap's industry-leading firing process subjects their porcelain to temperatures as high as 2552° F. This high-heat firing technique produces a pure white, hard feldspar porcelain that is non-porous, showcasing unmatched elegance and resilience for daily use.

The result of this meticulous production process is a set of espresso cups that embodies elegance, performance, and strength. Each cup is stamped with the Ancap mark, symbolizing quality and authenticity. Whether for a professional setting or personal use, the Ancap Palermo set offers a perfect blend of beauty, durability, and thermal insulation.
Indulge in the sophistication and performance of Ancap porcelain. Elevate your coffee ritual with the Ancap Palermo set today.

ancap-verona-white-coffee-cups,Verona Line Cups,"

 ANCAP Verona White Cups (Set of 6)

Experience the perfect balance of form and function with the ANCAP Verona White  Cups (Set of 6). These double espresso cups are the epitome of Italian craftsmanship, offering both beauty and practicality to coffee aficionados and professional baristas. The Verona design features a classic, rounded shape for comfortable handling and a thick-walled porcelain body that expertly retains heat.
column2:

Crafted with Ancap's dedication to quality, each Verona cup is made from a proprietary blend of Kaolin, Feldspar, and Quartz, ensuring a product that is not just visually stunning but also devoid of harmful substances like lead and cadmium. column3:

True to Ancap's high standards, the Verona cups undergo an intense firing process, reaching temperatures of up to 2552° F. This results in hard feldspar porcelain that is vitrified and non-porous, giving it a brilliant white finish that embodies sophistication and sturdiness for everyday use.
column4:

Whether it's for a bustling café or your home espresso bar, the ANCAP Verona set is designed to enhance your coffee experience, providing outstanding thermal properties and lasting durability.

All refurbished machines are inspected, tested and repaired in house under our 360 point inspection process:
Good as new: All parts with significant wear are replaced including brewing units, grinders and other significant parts in all classes.
360° Inspection: All machines are opened and meticulously cleaned, descaled and tested.
From the source: All work is done in house at the official Jura National Service center of Canada.
Warranty: All machines come with a 1 year parts and labor warranty.
Transparency: All machines come with a diagnostic report printed directly from the information stored on the machine.
Class A: Any machine that falls into class ""A"" will have 1-100 cups produced and minor if any cosmetic scuffs or scratches.
Class B: Any machine that falls into class ""B"" will have 101-1000 cups produced and some minor scuffs or scratches.
Class C: Any machine that falls into class ""C"" will have 1000+ cups produced and likely to have scuffs and scratches.

The Jura GIGA 5 is a timeless interpretation of a modern luxury Super-Automatic Espresso machine. With its unmistakable presence, modern design and state-of-the-art commercial-grade technology, it is the signature Impressa. The GIGA 5 is the first home machine to incorporate, 2 fully removable ceramic disk grinders, and 2 Thermo blocks - in one machine. The increased power has led the way for optimal performance, you can now prepare 2 milk-based drinks in one touch.

The GIGA 5 is about more than just coffee, Jura introduced a new Barista Specialty option which has a guide and recipes for 12 original specialty coffee creations. The GIGA 5 is the epitome of quality and has set a new standard in luxury for Super-Automatic Espresso Machines.
Double Thermoblock: The GIGA 5 is able to keep up with any level of demand and consumption thanks to its double thermoblock system. Say goodbye to wait times and hello to speed.

Fully Removable Ceramic Disk Grinders: Faster, quieter and more consistent than ever with precise electronic adjustments. These grinders give you the freedom to have multiple blends or a dedicated fresh whole bean decaf hopper.
Barista Mode: The GIGA 5 has a preloaded recipe and guide to preparing many specialty drinks, just select your beverage, get your ingredients, and follow the instructions on the screen!
Automatic Milk Cleaning System: The GIGA 5 will automatically clean its frother. This guarantees 100% hygiene and optimal performance.
Automatic Milk Valve: The GIGA 5 has a world-first adjustable milk valve. This valve gives the GIGA 5 the ability to switch between milk and milk foam automatically during preparation.
Full-Colour TFT Display: The GIGA 5 offers one the most intuitive interface with its full-colour TFT display.

One-Touch Operation: The GIGA 5 can prepare: 1 or 2 ristrettos, 1 or 2 espresso, 1 or 2 coffees, 1 or 2 latte macchiato, 1 or 2 cappuccino, 1 or 2 espresso macchiato, 1 or 2 milk foam, 1 or 2 custom cup and hot water (for tea) in one simple touch.

2 Milk Drinks, One Touch: For the first time ever in a home machine, you can prepare cappuccino, 2 latte macchiatos, 2 milk foam, 2 steamed milk or 2 espresso macchiatos simultaneously, in just one simple touch.
Fine Foam Frother: The integrated GIGA 5 frother makes perfect micro foam, try it with almond milk!

Fully Programmable: Program every drink to your liking or make adjustments on the fly with the simple rotary dial! Use the intuitive visual programming mode or the expert mode to set your strength and volume preferences for all drinks.
Height Adjustable Spouts: The GIGA 5 prepares all beverages from one central spout that is height adjustable from 7 - 15.9 cm.
Sustainability: All Jura machines use fresh ground coffee beans for every cup creating only compost, no capsules = no waste!
Ceramic Dual Grinders: The Ceramic grinders are fast, quiet, consistent and electronically adjustable.
Grinder By-pass: Bypass your ceramic grinders with pre-ground coffee for decaf or other blends.
Self-Cleaning: No need to remove the brewing unit or fuss with internal mechanisms as all Jura machines are fully self-cleaning.
Colour TFT Display: Easy to use, easy to maintain - an intuitive interface that utilizes the buttons or rotary dial to select what coffee specialty you want to prepare.
Filter or Descale: JURA machines enable users to choose between using Claris filters- Freshwater in = fresh coffee out, or traditional descaling methods.
Sleek Modern Design: The GIGA 5 has Aluminium front panels, chrome hopper lids, and elegant lighting that creates a commanding presence in any kitchen.

Peace of Mind: As the official Canadian Distributor, Faema Canada provides full in house service at our state of the art National Canadian service center located in Mississauga, Ontario. All machines come with 1-year parts and labour warranty.

(1) JURA GIGA 5
(1) JURA Care kit which includes: Pack of 2 Cleaning tablets, 2 Claris Blue Filter, User Manuals, 1 Hose with Connector, 1 Extra Air Valve, 1 100ml Cappuccino Cleaner, 1 Filter Extension, 1 Pre-ground Coffee Scoop and 1 Water Hardness Testing Strip.

All refurbished machines are inspected, tested and repaired in house under our 360 point inspection process:
Good as new: All parts with significant wear are replaced including brewing units, grinders and other significant parts in all classes.
360° Inspection: All machines are opened and meticulously cleaned, descaled and tested.
From the source: All work is done in house at the official Jura National Service center of Canada.
Warranty: All machines come with a 1 year parts and labor warranty.
Transparency: All machines come with a diagnostic report printed directly from the information stored on the machine.
Class A: Any machine that falls into class ""A"" will have 1-100 cups produced and minor if any cosmetic scuffs or scratches.
Class B: Any machine that falls into class ""B"" will have 101-1000 cups produced and some minor scuffs or scratches.
Class C: Any machine that falls into class ""C"" will have 1000+ cups produced and likely to have scuffs and scratches.

The JURA Impressa Z9 is the super-automatic espresso machine that does it all. Its impressive coffee quality, friendly user interface, and captivating design make it the optimal JURA machine for those who want the best of the best. Swiss design and Swiss-made, the Z9 exudes quality and elegant precision.

Operation is simple, using the buttons or rotary dial to communicate with the TFT full-colour display, the machine will prepare espresso, coffee, cappuccino, latte macchiato and other specialties at the touch of a button. The JURA Z line has been the top of the JURA home line, and now with our certified factory refurbished line, now is your chance to bring one home at a better price than ever!

An Authentic Experience: State-of-the-art technology is all about creating a true and authentic result. The Aroma+ grinder can grind fresh coffee beans twice as fast as conventional grinders while at the same time preserving all their delicious aroma. There are two Thermoblocks (one for coffee and hot water and another for steam) to ensure optimum preparation conditions.

User-Friendly Operation: The Rotary Switch and TFT colour display ensures intuitive operation. Six products can be individually arranged and labelled on the screen. Together with the ability to select 11 specialties with the Rotary dial control, this means that you can create any coffee you could possibly want in no time. Thanks to the coffee à la carte selection function, the range of options are almost unlimited, as it allows you to adjust the settings to suit current requirements in a flash.

Crowning Glory: Latte macchiato, cappuccino and other specialties are extremely popular all around the world. Featuring fine foam technology, the IMPRESSA Z9 is able to produce milk foam that is the perfect consistency for all coffee specialties, especially latte macchiato. Thanks to the way the cappuccino spout can be adjusted up to a height of 153 mm, even large glasses are accommodated with ease.

Design: The unmistakable design combines purest luxury, elegance and sophistication. The striking lines reflect the shape of the coffee bean. The high-quality materials used are produced with maximum precision and outstanding craftsmanship.
